text:
Tempat ini adalah surga. Aku ada di sana bersama pacar saya dan 2 pasangan lain di akhir pekan perjalanan ke bali. 
Poin yang bagus:
pelayanan luar biasa dan staff yang ramah.
Sarapan yang enak.
Perjalanan gratis ke seminyak dan itu benar-benar membantu kami.
Benar-benar berterima kasih atas bantuannya yang cepat ketika aku jatuh sakit.
harga bir yang lebih murah dibandingkan dengan minimarket di luar
speaker bose yang baik

buruk poin:
tidak ada!

Tips:
cobalah barbekyu. Layak!
Gunakan transportasi di villa untuk berkeliling di  bali untuk penawaran yang lebih baik.
title: Pengalaman yang tak ternilai

owner_response.text:
What a pleasure to read your review on our staff and services at O Villas. It can be a distressing time falling ill whilst, and I thankyou for acknowledging our staff for their assistance. 

For our in-villa service menu and mini bar prices we try and remain competitive to the local market and we recommend to anyone to try the BBQ if they get the chance. It is a great way to enjoy the outdoor area of the larger villas or terrace in the 1 Bedroom and celebrate an occasion or just being on holiday.

Thankyou again for your review and we hope to welcome you back at O Villas again soon.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We found the bed too hard as we are used to an ensemble, the outdoor pool lounges need updating . The breakfast was lovely every morning and plenty of food. Our villa was clean and  a big thanks to Tommy for our anniversary surprise.  It was great and necessary for the OVilla cars to drop us off in Seminyak as most days too hot to walk. All staff were friendly especially Tommy.
title: A lovely quite secluded Villa

text: We stayed in 3 properties while in Bali for 17 days over the Christmas & New Year Period. This Villa was not cheap but was very disappointing compared to the previous reviews & photos. Under no circumstances should it be rated a 4.5 star. I can not fault the wonderful staff who were so obliging and friendly, the Villa itself is in need of an update and a very good clean. Bathrooms & floors were dirty and towels need replacing although laundered, stained and yellow. There were dirty walls and fixtures and gaps and broken parts in most rooms.
title: 10 Person Villa

text:
We stayed for 5 nights in a 4 bedroom villa.  The villa was dated, dirty and in need of maintenance.  

Positives, staff were extremely pleasant and breakfast was good. 

We have stayed at far superior villas in Seminyak at comparable prices.
title: Disappointing

text: O Villas ambiance is amazing , clean villa , staff very attentive , just a small details, the safe wasn't safe at all you can move it, the toilet a bit dark , in general the facilities are great , good accommodation , we enjoy a lot the night spent in O Villa
title: Good experience

text:
What can I say about o villas ? Nothing but good 😍Always have a wonderful time . Greeted at the airport with a drink in the  limo to the villas . Made so welcome from arriving to leaving . Nothing too much trouble from the staff . 
Rooms are spacious with big double showers , fans and Aircon  worked well , spotless . Pool clean, pool cleaners discreet when visited . The kitchen and tv lounge spacious , lots of tv channels , sport. Menu available for food in the evening  if we wanted it . Nobody I’ll or sick in the week we were there . 
Breakfast menu offered the night before then served at the time we wanted. Nothing too much trouble - lots of suggestions of places to visit  , dropping off and picking us up anywhere on the island .  
Restaurants 10minute walk , massages and coffee shops. 
This is the third time I’ve visited o villas and I’m booking again for next year .  Love it 😍
title: Amazing 3rd holiday at o villas

text: We just had a superb week at O Villas...the accommodation itself is finished to a high standard with even the basics like super comfy beds, huge modern bathroom, new fluffy bathrobes and towels all of top quality standard...the very efficient and friendly staff will look after you with 5 Star care...they couldn’t do enough for us. The WiFi was fast and TV screen huge. The location was great..being just minutes from shops, great restaurants like Kultur, Basil and Cartel coffee...the lane leading to the property was quiet and clean. It was peaceful and tranquil to relax by the pool surrounded by well manicured plants and trees while cooling off in the pool. Highly recommended and we can’t wait to return.

user_location.name: El Puerto de Santa Maria, Spanyol

title: Excellent place for many reasons

text:
This is a very poor Villa.  The hygiene is spotty at best, with white towels having several stains, the water in the swimming pool being unclean and the general upkeep of the entire place shoddy.  In our Villa (#2), the airconditioning did not work well and even the ceiling fan wouldn't switch on (despite asking the Management Office to look into it).  The battery in the in-room safe died on us, with our things in it (including my laptop).  Shockingly, the management team did not have a key to open the safe and hence they had to saw it open, damaging my laptop in the process!!!

Even the trees in the courtyard need maintenance, as I had a huge coconut tree branch fall off the tree literally 5 metres from where I was sitting.  If it had hit me, I would have been seriously injured or worse.

The only redeeming feature of this villa is the staff, who try their best to make the best of your stay.  However, friendly and helpful staff is not a point of difference in a place like Bali, where most places have wonderful people.

Therefore - look elsewhere.
title: Poor Hygiene, Many amenities not working

text:
Accommodation was great / clean and staff super friendly 
Morning breakfast cooked fresh each day was the best way to the day
Dropped off around Seminyak daily was so handy to have and also being picked up
Great all round holiday
title: Holiday

text: We stayed 9 nights end Feb 2019, and had some excellent communication before arrival with Lisa as our party size changed and we also wished to book ahead with certain activities and she was so helpful. On arrival we couldn’t believe the space we had (almost a bit too much for 2 couples / 2 small children) and the quality of the rooms and pool. Breakfast was amazing and Yanti and her team even hels and rocked my 4 month old so we could eat quietly and in peace, they were so lovely and accommodating. Tommy, Ketut and all the staff were great with picking us up/ dropping off almost daily (my 3 year old loved then and being allowed in the front!) and were also great with organising tips and things like takeaways for evenings in. We can’t wait to return, thank you all so much for a fabulous stay.
title: Amazing hospitality- can’t wait to return

text:
manager and driver was prompt in picking up from airport. Rooms were clean and bathroom fully furnished. Pool was turned on in the morning and sunbeds made by the time i woke up. 
You'll select your breakfast- indonesian with a generous serving of bread and fruit. 

Didnt walk around as we got a driver so can't comment on accessibility. Then again, you'll feel like not leaving the villa at all.
title: excellent pick up, pool and breakfast
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Great location in Seminyak. 
Loved the size and flow of the villa, all of the bedrooms overlook the pool area and feel very private from each other. 
There were six of us occupying four bedrooms, great size rooms all with huge en-suites.
The kitchen, living and dining area is a great space for all the family/friends. 
The staff and management team at O’Villas made our stay such a memorable one, we were so spoilt. 
So many great places to have breakfast in Seminyak but our favourite was in the Villas! So easy when there is a group of you. Especially the bacon and eggs......Also would highly recommend the Chefs BBQ for an evening in! So good! 
Thanks again for such a relaxing time at O’Villas, hopefully see you in the not too distant future. 
Sare and Alex
title: Outstanding O’Villas!

text: Spacious,clean great staff a car to pick you up and drop you off at the airport...it’s down a lane way so you feel the kids are safe you never walk the lane way just call one of your 3 drivers and they take you anywhere....free in Seminyak fare priced elsewhere....they have 4 platinum memberships for Finns (the in place)and Splash....(owned by the same people. Breakfast is made fresh for you each morning (just order the day before)...the fruit is good quality nice for Bali. And it’s affordable we booked via Hotels.com but all the groups list them. We loved that it’s far enough from eat street and the crowds that you don’t hear the dance music reverberating all night long ..,,yet close enough that you can go misbehave if you want to!!!
title: Now that’s a villa

text: Great villas. The staff is very friendly and cheerful. 7 of us stayed here for 5 nights with an infant. The villa is huge and we'll planned. Just the air cons on top floor can be upgraded as at noon time they are not able to cool the room. Overall a great experience.
title: Stay at O Villas

text: O Villas was a great place to stay for 8 days with 9 girls... celebrating a birthday for 1 of the ladies... the villas are set up great and the pool so inviting.... the staff went above and beyond and couldn’t help you enough, just truly lovely people... we had so much fun there, it’s a shame it’s over.... the breakfast which was made by the staff in your villa was so delicious and fresh and amazing... the granola fruit bowl was a hit with all the girls...
title: Simply amazing.

text: We had a fantastic time at O Villas, with 3 of us.  I would definitely stay there again, and there was plenty of room for at least 5 more people.  The living space is huge and offers a full indoor open plan kitchen,  lounge and dining room.  Breakfast was included in our room rate and prepared in our villa every morning at whatever time we chose.  We also ate in for dinner a couple of times and the food was good.  All the staff were extremely friendly and efficient and made our stay like a home away from home.  The on-site driving service was great (complimentary in Seminyak) and let us avoid trying to negotiate with taxi drivers.  We also arranged for a day tour around the island with one of their drivers and he took us to much better sites (less touristy and far less busy) than the previous year I was in Bali and took another tour through a different hotel.  The driver was also a very good driver (as were all the other drivers) and we felt safe at all times. Thoroughly recommended.
title: Brilliant 6 night stay

text:
Booked a stay here for 6 nights for my honeymoon . Placed in a 1 bedroom villa , first impressions were amazing with the beautifully clean villa in a great quiet location a few 100m off the main road . Pool size is great and lounge area and amenities are great . Service from staff including KETUT and Wyan have been above expectation with both people going out of there way to help us . Shuttle service has been great around seminyak and they will be more than happy to accompany you on a day trip for a little fee to Uluwatu or any other location . 
Will highly recommend people to stay here at the O’Villas If relaxing and quietness is what your after 👍🏻😀
title: Quiet getaway , Amazing villa

owner_response.text: Congratulations on your wedding and thankyou for choosing to stay at O Villas to celebrate your honeymoon. We are very happy to read your lovely comments about our staff and how their attention to detail and the serviced offered made your stay a memorable one. Thankyou again we hope to welcome you back at O Villas again.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Staff are lovely. Thank you for looking after us, Shanti, Tomi, Agus, Kardi. Staff went out of their way to look after us. Loved the Villa and pool, nice and clean. Room service food was nice.
Driving us into Seminyak, Legian or Kuta was quick and no trouble.
This is a great place to stay.
Thanks from The Longstaffs
title: Fully recommend

owner_response.text: Hi Maz, Thankyou for your review of our villas. It was a pleasure to have you stay and hearing about your stay and what you enjoyed most. The Finns Recreational Club is a great added bonus when you stay with us, we are pleased you made use of the membership. We hope to welcome you back the villas again soon.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: My family party of 6 stayed in a 3 bedroom villa for 2 weeks in September and it was fantastic. Nothing was too much trouble for Tommy and all the staff. We really appreciated all their hard work and the trouble they went to to make our holiday a special one. The lounge/kitchen part of the villa was large and comfortable - plenty of room for 6 people - with doors we could shut. The bedrooms also big with huge bathrooms. The pool was an excellent size and the whole place was very private. Being away from the main shopping area was a bonus as it was quiet and peaceful and the villa drivers dropped us wherever we wanted to go - all the drivers were excellent and very nice people. The breakfasts were excellent, good variety, staff pleasant and very professional, it was a lovely start to the day. We also ordered from the inhouse menu and from restaurants around Seminak, food consistently good - would highly recommend the Happy Chappy Chinese restaurant -  fantastic meal at reasonable price. We hired one of the villa vans to take us to Ubud - $70 for the whole day, excellent value and a great day trip.  There is a huge variety of spa treatments in Seminak and many places within walking distance of the villa. All in all we felt very spoiled and would return to the villa next time. Thanks Tommy, Katuk, and all the O Villa staff!
title: O Villas was fabulous!

text:
I stayed here with 3 friends, and have stayed at many villas in Bali. O villas was my best experience. Our free airport pickup was on time and we had a lovely introduction to the villa layout. There are too many positives to write about so I will list them.
1. Large bedrooms, with comfortable bed and large bathroom.
2. Reading light by bed.
3.Fantastic aircon and hot water.
4. Very large dinning and TV area, enclosed with aircon and projection TV.
5.Fantastic cooked breakfast made to order. Eggs, bacon ,beans ,croissants, fresh fruit, twining's tea and pod coffee.
6.Beautifull pool.
7.Free transport in Seminyak area. Wonderful driver for pickup and drop off. Just pick up the phone and they where there.
8.Extremly helpful staff led by Tommy. Nothing was too much trouble. We just picked up the phone with any queries and they where there to help. 
9. Full stocked fridge with drinks and ice prior to arrival. Pay as you go
title: Ticks all the boxes

text: From the moment we entered the Villa the staff looked after us with so much care, friendliness and warmth. We booked a two bedroom villa but were given the 5 bedroom villa with a choice on which rooms we wanted- each room was beautiful, spacious and clean. Breakfast was cooked fresh at the villa and was wonderful everyday. They also provide transport around Seminyak which was so helpful. Leaving was possibly the most difficult thing we had to do.
title: Luxury stay in Seminyak
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: I can't rate O Villas more highly. This was our first time in Bali so we were a bit worried about getting around etc but O Villas made it so easy. Nothing was too much trouble, including getting crutches for my husband to use when he injured his foot Day 1 (at no extra expense). The free breakfast was so delicious - pancakes, eggs benedict, fruit and pastries. The staff were so lovely, personable and it was nice to get an insight into their lives in Indonesia. Thank you so so much O Villas team (special mention to Tommy & Kadak who were the best). We'll be back for sure.
title: Incredible Staff & Amazing Experience

text: This is our 5th visit to Bali having stayed in different accommodation around Seminyak  each time. O Villa falls right in the middle as far as expense goes but was the BEST for us in regards to proximity, size and staff. The villa itself was great, 4 large bedrooms with everything you'd expect. The main lounge, dining and kitchen area was large and very comfortable. The addition of a big screen and projector was great for our family. Unlike some villas, the lounge area was enclosed which we find much more enjoyable, it did have big sliding doors if you prefer an open feel. The things we loved most and the reasons we will re book this villa for next year were the location and the staff. The villa is removed enough that it is quiet and relaxed, but is only a short walk into eat street one way and Potato Head, Kudeta the other. It was also a 15 minute (depending on time of day) scooter ride to Batu Balong for a surf and less to Canggu Club featuring Bounce, bowling, kids club and a small water park. The villa provided us with platinum passes to the Canggu Club which gave us free entry to the water park and discounts to all other facilities. The staff were absolutely outstanding, Putu, Bayu and Yanti were  the main people that made sure we were well looked after. Every morning we were greated with a lovely breakfast and friendly smile, nothing was too much trouble Bayu even looked after our boys Angus and Henry for a short time so we could enjoy a nice meal without kids. They were always looking for ways to make our stay easier and more enjoyable.
title: Great location and amazing staff!

text:
Stayed in one bedroom villa.  It was large, the aircon worked, so all was well.  Had a reasonably nice time, but do agree with others regarding cleanliness and need to update furnishings.  There were marks around the toilet the first morning till the last. Cleaning didn't seem to be a priority, except for changing the linen every single day, which I found very odd as I have never come across this before.  I would have been quite happy for every 2nd or third day.  Towels were not in good condition, stained and some were torn. 

The staff were lovely and very accommodating, and able to take us wherever we wanted.  I did find it odd that on two occasions we were advised that the computer was offline/broken and could we pay in cash.  Normally not a problem, but on the last day paying $100AUD in cash to stay in the room till close to our boarding time meant a trip to the ATM and being charged fees from the bank in Oz, that was annoying, would have been much easier to pay by credit.  

The three/four bedroom units had large pools, looked like they were nicely furnished, with one bedroom downstairs, which would be ideal with family with older relatives.
There is no reception and no main pool. 

The view from the villa isn't nice, you overlook a large power box and lines.The road to the villa is very narrow and not in good repair.  You do feel a bit isolated, and for that reason I would not stay here again.

If you don't like stairs, well, it's 20 up/down and the pool is downstairs, which wasn't that good in the heat of the day!!

Breakfast was very good, and one night we ordered room service and again, food was very nice and plentiful.

Thank you to the staff, they were all lovely, every single one of them.
title: 20 stairs up and down to one beddie

text:
We stayed in the 1-bedroom villa for four nights on this trip back to Bali. We must have been spoilt at our previous pool villa which we did not pay that much more for because OVillas fell quite far below what we were expecting.

Sadly, the villa we stayed in is in dire need of a good scrubbing of all surfaces, replacement of all soft furnishings (including the day curtains which had huge holes in them and the discoloured towels), discoloured walls, and much more. While it is spacious within the villa with a good-sized living room, bedroom, walk-in wardrobe and huge toilet, the pool is really too small. It took two strokes to get to the other side (length-wise) and every morning, we'd see leaves and white particles (from the surrounding vegetation) floating in the pool. 

One day the television did not work, and another morning there was no water. Our breakfast box we ordered for 6:15 am (we were told this would not be a bother at all) arrived at 6:55 am. We were given a lovely bowl of complimentary fruit, but no knives or plates were available to cut them. On the night we wanted to drink our beer, we found there was no bottle opener. While we could have asked the staff to cut fruit for us or deliver a bottle opener to us, we were also wondering if these should not be basic amenities the room should provide? As we brushed aside these inconvenience, we did feel a a little more than let down. 

OVillas is located quite far in from the main road. We are pretty self-sufficient people and walked in and out to the beach and other parts of Seminyak without using the in-house transport. It was not difficult to find food and mini-marts less than 100 m out, although I'd highly recommend having a torchlight handy if you're walking back after dinner. 

As mentioned in previous reviews, the staff are the redeeming factor here. We came home to a turned-down bed and air-con turned on every night (except the last night), and the staff were eager to find out our daily plans to see how they could assist us. So thank you to Putu, Ketut and Bayu for being so attentive and accommodating.
title: Tired Villa in need of Refurbishing

text: As title says this place is ok but we have been spoiled it seems with other Villas at a similar price that are better locate and nicer. This Villa is quite remote with very few cafes, restaurants and bars nearby you would need to walk a kilometre to find but Road is narrow and busy. O Villas market themselves as luxury Villas but our 1 bedroom apartment with tiny pool we thought was far from luxurious. It looks quite dirty and tired from outside and needs a coat of paint and gerni to remove mould and dirt. Inside is ok I wouldn't call it a 1 bedroom just glass wall and door separating bedroom from lounge room. Kitchenette no not really sorry no oven or hot plates inside or even a sink these are outside which is quite inconvenient on hot nights with mozzies. Staff are fantastic and make the place and free shuttle around town is great we just prefer the freedom to walk to dinner and drinks.
title: Ok but not for us

text:
We travelled with teenage kids, from country NSW Australlia, the villa was fantastic, it was beautiful and clean, nothing was a bother.  We had the most amazing breakfasts (the chocolate and strawberry pancakes were the best) the staff at the villa created a great seafood BBQ for us and arranged a whole suckling big for another evening.
The pool was crystal clear, the photos do not do it justice it was a large pool.
The villa staff could not be more helpful, arranging day trips to white water rafting and pick ups from the airport.
Kids loved the wi fi too.
By the time we left the villa staff felt like family.
Looking forward to going back.
title: Family holiday

text:
As a family this is our second visit to O Villas in Bali & its better than we remembered. The accomodation is private & secluded, the staff incredibly helpful & friendly & Seminyak caters for all tastes.

With a few day trips strategically placed around times spent by the pool this break has recharged our batteries & re-enforced O Villas & Bali on our list as a place to return to in the future.
title: Mix of relaxation & action in Bali

text: Nothing short of amazing! It was hard to leave the villa on this holiday as it had everything.. Really nice bedrooms, massive bathroom with plenty of space..... The kitchen and lounge is huge!!! The mini bar, which is a large stainless steel fridge was great, the beers, soft drink etc was cheaper to buy than anywhere you could get it...... A big pool that is well maintained, a outdoor shower and toilet which is convenient after swimming..... Like I said, it's hard to leave...... The most outstanding point of this Villa is the customer service and staff.... They add a real person touch, helping us with everything and anything we needed... The breakfast each morning was my favourite time of the day, the food was magnificent! The breakfast crew catered for everything we needed.. Even organised Vegemite for me! They were so polite and courteous and were happy to answer any questions I had about Bali and their culture..... They weren't just the staff, I become really good friends with them... The customer service was world class!   I would recommend O Villas Seminyak to anyone, particularly to family's... Its located in a quiet section in Seminyak and it's so peaceful...... If you want a great holiday stay here, you won't regret it..... Thank you to everyone at O Villas Seminyak!! I can't wait to come back! Amazing!!      Tim 👍
title: Absolutely Amazing!!

text:
From the minute my friends and I stepped into our Villa, the first impression was nothing short of amazement at the beautiful villla, pool and grounds..... we felt like we were in paradise. A huge THANK YOU must go out to all the staff at O Villas, all our needs were met above and beyond our expectations, smiling, friendly staff that would do anything to make your stay enjoyable, from cooking our breakfast in our villa every morning, (the breakfasts were delicious!!) to taking us anywhere we needed to go during the day or night- we were simply amazed! 
We will definitely be booking there again next time we visit Bali without a second thought. Again another Thank you to the amazing staff, you made our holiday, and so glad to make some new friends along the way!
title: Outstanding!!!!

text:
Spent a week at the "O villa" with my fiancé an 2 boys an all I can say was amazing!!!...the villa itself is in a quiet spot in Seminyak yet walking distance to shops,markets an eat street,the villa roomy,bedrooms spacious an a lot of hours spent in the awesome pool area.
The staff are on another level with nothing being a problem,from doing laundry to dropping us off into Kuta/Seminyak for dinner an then picking us up when finished.....big thanks to kadek,ketut an the lovely staff that made us breakfast every morning.....an a big thanks to our butler tomcat who made every minute of our stay perfect.
Will definitely be back in the near future.......thank you O villa for the memories
title: Amazing

text: We stayed in January for nine nights with our daughter and her partner. The service was perfect as all the staff were so friendly and helpful,  nothing was too much trouble From the moment we entered our villa the perfect experience began. The pool the bedrooms the lounge and dinning areas were spotless and the pool so relaxing. The complementary taxi was a very nice touch. They also made a cake and decoarated the dinning area for Ronans birthday. Well done to all the fantastic staff. We will return from England and our daughter will return from Australia. Perfect holiday.
title: Superb Villas......Amazing Staff.

text: I stayed 3 nights in a 3-bedroom villa with my parents and my two young kids. The rooms are clean and the private swimming poor is nice. The staff are very friendly and accommodating. Everything from breakfast, room service to free shuttle are personalized to suit our needs. Everyone of our family has been well looked after. Special thanks to our driver Kadek. He is very patient, helpful and humorous. My kids absolutely love him.
title: Great Service and Beautiful Villa

text:
Stayed Here at O Villas for 5 nights had an awesome time in my own private little villa. The immpecible service provided by the staff started immediately from the moment I was picked up at the airport to the day the I left.

What the O Villas makes up for in grandure and stature it makes up with heart and that amazing balinese smile and service standards.

Had room service twice both very good and cheap meals.Hired a driver for a days sightseeing and saw all Bali had to offer driver was excellent very helpfull and very informative.

The free shuttle that Villas provide make it very easy to Get around.

Special Thanks to Ketut ,Putu , Wayan and Kadek who looked after me on my stay.

Ill be back for sure next time with my family
title: Amazing Service & Staff

text:
I stayed at O'villas with my family for 9 days and from the moment we were picked up at the airport, we were welcomed into Bali with open arms from the staff. Once we arrived at the villa at 10pm, they provided us with a minty beverage which was unexpected to say hello. Our butler also gave us a tour of the whole villa. The size of the villa, bedrooms and pool were larger than anticipated as well! They also provide free transportation around Seminyak which also came in handy for us and saved us plenty of money. 

Every morning the staff would cook us breakfast at our preferred time and of our choice from a selected menu, which consisted of both Indonesian and European cuisine. This also included a wide range of seasonal fruits and pastries with a selection of spreads.

The villa would be cleaned every morning whilst we were out so that there was no interruption during our stay. They also provided service at all times when necessary of a phone call away - helping out with the projector to watch movies and so much more. 

Free wifi was given, a private pool, beach towels, poolside beds and gazebo, full equipped kitchen with cutlery, crockery and glassware. Tea, coffee and filtered water was also provided on a daily basis for free. The fridge was filled with drinks that are charged a lot cheaper than purchasing it outside of the villa - including Bintangs!!! 

The staff are extremely friendly, welcoming, easy to joke around with and helpful! They know how to look after you and are the true meaning of hospitality! 

Special thanks to Bayu, Tommy, Kadek, Chef Kadek, Yanti and Agus!!! You were the cherry on top of our holiday in Bali! Thank you so much! Lots of love from the Teoh Family from New Zealand! 🇳🇿
title: Simply wonderful!

text: Checked in for 4nights, great experienced with the pleasant staffs. Flexible  Breakfast time. Free return airport transport service provided. Hotel transport  to discovery shooping mall (kuta) with a reasonable price charge. Driver provided for free to drive from hotel to anywhere around seminyak. Very clean and spacious villa. Will come again in near future.
title: Great villas with awesome staffs

text:
We just completed a fantastic 8 night stay at O Villas! Being a family of 6 with 4 little children we needed a spacious kid friendly area.... and O Villas met everything we needed. They were even able to provide a pool fence at the very lasy minute.
No request was ever too much trouble for the staff...   The service of the staff was absolutely impeccable and they always went above and beyond for us as a family. Yanti even helped feed my babies breakfast!! 😊
Thank you so much for making our stay so memorable and so easy whilst travelling with little children! We cannot wait to come back next year.
title: Impeccable service of staff!!! Thank you O Villas

text: Spent a week at O Villas with my family. It is situated in a quiet location not far from restaurants and shops. It is large, stylish and clean. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful - happy to organise whatever you may need or want to do. A local driver service is included to drop you off and pick you up as you need. We loved the cooked breakfast each morning and if you wish to stay in at night, the room service options are great and well priced. We had the in Villa BBQ one night which was fantastic - the home made sauces were superb. I highly recommend O Villas for a great Bali getaway.
title: Great Villa - Awesome service - Will come again

text: The staff at O villas are just lovely, we were a bunch of 9 of us staying there over the weekend for a birthday. They were just warm, they were attentive, took care of all our needs and even decorated the living room for the birthday. They were nice to get us cake in the morning for the birthday girl along with the whole staff who sang for us. The villas are nice and spacious, very clean and in a good location. The breakfast was just too good, loved the nasi goreng!  We all had such a great time at O villas and will definitely visit there again!
title: Great Hospitality, Amazing Villas

text: We visited O Villas at the end of our honeymoon in Bali and it was the perfect way to end the trip. The staff, particularly Bayu were very attentive!! The villa is ideally situated just outside the hustle and bustle of Seminyak but close enough that you can easily access all the great restaurants, shops and night life by the complimentary shuttle service. The shuttle service is readily available to drop and collect you from wherever you want to go. The villa itself was spacious, comfortable and very relaxing - we also had a private pool. We can't recommend this villa highly enough and the staff were amazing.
title: Wonderful experience

text: I can't say enough about our experience at O Villas. We were a group of 12, so had two villas next to each other. The villas themselves are beautiful, with huge rooms and the most comfortable beds ever. The pool area is perfect for lazy days of tanning and relaxing. Even better, though, was the service. Bayu, Tommy, Ketut, and the rest of the staff were incredibly friendly and accommodating. No request was too large, and the complimentary taxi rides were so helpful. Breakfast is included as well, and it was lovely to have the staff prepare it in the villas every morning. It's not on the menu, but ask for the strawberry pancakes! Delicious! As for location, it was perfect for walking into Seminyak. About 10-15 minutes in either direction will get you to eat street or Seminyak Square. I would absolutely stay here on my next group trip to Bali!
title: Beautiful spot for amazing value

text: We had a lovely 5 days at O Villas.  Great layout - big rooms and huge en-suites.  Pool was great.  The outstanding feature of this place is the staff - they were all so friendly, and so helpful.  They could not have done any more for us.  A big thank you to Ketut and Bayu.  Shuttle service was brilliant - always available, and very flexible.  Cleanliness maybe not quite up to standard, but otherwise terrific place, and I would thoroughly recommend it.
title: 5 days at O Villas August '16

text: Very large,  well appointed villa.  Very private, lovely garden and swimming pool.  What makes this villa so special are the wonderful staff who just can't do enough for you to make your holiday memorable.  We sat down to a delicious breakfast every morning.  The car was always available to drive us around Seminyak.  The staff were so friendly and helpful.  I highly recommend O Villas.  It was perfect for 4 of us as we each had our own bathroom with ensuite and a separate lounge/kitchen area for meals, relaxing and watching movies and tv.  There are lovely cafes and spas only a short walk from the villa.
title: Great value

text: A mid range villa, with a small swimming pool, 4 bedrooms with large bathrooms, a large living room. Maids cooked excellent breakfast every morning. Good value for money. Free pick up and drop service was a bonus.
title: Good villa, good price

text:
We stayed at the villas recently as a family- 8 adults and 2 small children, and cannot praise O Villas highly enough for all they did to make our holiday enjoyable. Ketut and his team go over and above with their level of service and and friendliness. Having a car service at your disposal (especially transporting all 10 of us at any one time) was an added bonus. The staff coming in each day to cook a delicious breakfast and then clean it all away was a sheer luxury, as were the massages by the pool!  Would also recommend the BBQ dinner that is available to have cooked at your villa. 
I particularly want to praise Lisa who handled all our booking requirements so promptly and with such understanding of our situation. 
For a great Bali experience, stay at OVillas.
title: A special place in Seminyak

text: Our week-long stay at O Villas was fantastic. Our group of 9 consisted of adults and grandkids and we were all looked after beautifully. The amenities are fabulous and the staff were considerate, kind and helpful. They made you feel like you were part of their family! The location is a little way off the main shopping strips but the staff are very happy to drop you anywhere in the Seminyak area - for free. Special thanks to Ketut, Yanti, Tomy, Bayu and Kedak. Angus, Lola & Ruby NEVER want to stay anywhere else in Bali! Suksama and sampi jumpa!
title: Perfect family holiday

text: Every comfort of home and more large air-conditioned  lounge room & kitchen 4 large separate bedrooms one down stairs and 3 up stairs all with their own bathrooms & tvs all very clean  has  a lovely garden with fish pond and large swimming pool about 10 minutes out of seminyak car service to the shops availble fantastic staff could not do enough for you.Cooked daily breakfast large choice of food to choose from all the staff were fantastic  with our 9month old  granddaughter the staff go out of there way to make sure you have every thing you need highly recommend

text:
Wow! Amazing from day 1 to checkout! Free pickup and drop off from airport :) Our flight was late 1.5hrs and driver was still there. The staff drove us everywhere we needed to go and picked us up. 
From shops, resturants etc. Breakfast served in villa by private chef, anything from sausages and egg to crepes with strawberries. The villa itself was superclean and towels changed daily and cleaned rooms. We were 8 adults and had 4 bedrooms with all private ensuite and king sized beds. If you are a large group, THIS IS YOUR VILLA!! The staff are amazing! Makes you want to recommend to everyone so noone misses out on the service ovilla provides! Do it, book it!

text:
We stayed in villa 1 for 10 nights in March. We were a family of a 10 month old, 3 year old, mum, dad and grandmother. Arriving at the airport we immediately spotted our name. It was hot hot hot however as soon as we hopped in the car we were given fresh cold bottles of water - soooooo good!
The villa itself was lovely and clean. The beds were enormous. As it is a 4 bedroom villa we had to choose which 3 bedrooms we wanted. We chose the 1 downstairs and 2 of the 3 upstairs which we advised the lady after she'd shown us around. We were a little disappointed that the 3rd room we chose was locked with the air con off when we arrived after looking around that arvo. As a result, they had to come and open it however it was like a hot box so my hubby and 3 year old had to sleep downstairs. 
*Beware families with small children: we had a pool fence around the pool however my 3 year old still got in the pool and almost drowned. Also, the steps to the upstairs bedrooms are quite steep for little ones (as well as older ppl).
Bayu, kadek, wayno (Wayne), tommy two gloves and ketut were great - would take us places whenever we wanted and get us take away from whichever restaurant we wanted (when we simply just wanted to stay in!)
The villa had a full kitchen so you could cook yourself if you wanted.
The breakfast was cooked in our villa and was lovely.
The bathrooms were a little tired & the location was about 10mins walk (in extreme humidity!) from the heart of where you want to be in seminyak. 
All in all a nice place to stay however needs a little updating.
title: Nice villas

owner_response.text:
Thankyou for your comments and review on the villas. It sounds like the cold refreshments on arrival where needed, March can be a very hot and humid time to visit being right at the end of the rainy season. It was disappointing to hear that not all rooms had the air-conditioning on for your arrival, this is our normal check-in procedure and we have noted this to be addressed and apologise for the inconvenience on your first night. It was quite a surprise to also read your comments in regards to the pool fencing, it must of been quite a scare. With the temporary fencing it is installed only at clients request as it is not a safety requirement in Bali. All of our villas are for private use and we do please ask that children are fully supervised around the water at all times, our staff can also assist if and when required. 

We really appreciate your comments on the staff and how they looked after you during your stay. You have made some valid comments on the layout configuration of the villas and for anyone wanting to review you can find detailed floor plans of each of our villas on our website.  We hope that you and your family will come back and visit Bali again soon.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed in villa 3 as a group of 7 adults and one infant. The 4 king bed rooms were all individually secure and huge and they each had massive bathrooms. It was like our own little resort with a great lounge, dining and kitchen space to get together, hang out and eat as a group. The pool was a good size and received a mix of sun and shade throughout the day, there were sun lounges and a day bed poolside hut.
The villa offers free airport pick up and drop off which was seamless and also free transport around Seminyak from the villa. This is great as the location of the villa is a bit out of the way, but by car you are surrounded by restaurants, shops and spas within 5 minutes. The staff at the villa and our butlers were fantastic, so friendly and helpful - nothing was too much trouble. We arranged a BBQ at the villa for my sister's birthday, the food was great and we didn't have to do a thing. The staff shopped cooked and cleaned up, they even entertained and held the baby while we were eating! That day while we were out they decorated the dining room with balloons, streamers and a happy birthday banner! We were so impressed and thank the team for making my sister's birthday so special!
The villa was very clean, the wifi great throughout the villa. Overall the villa set up was great and the staff made our stay thoroughly enjoyable!

text:
We had 2 of the 4 bedroom villas for family and friends for a week, and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. From the moment we were picked up at the airport until we were dropped back a week later nothing was a bother to the staff.

They served breakfast when we wanted it, drove us everywhere and then picked us up, day and night, the service was great. The villas have a fridge stocked with drinks at prices relatively equal to the local minimart so no need to even go out for drinks. There is also an in house menu and custom meals option, which we didn't use much because of the vast array of great restaurants nearby, but what was ordered was very good and reasonably priced.

They also do laundry at a very cheap rate so everything is covered.

My daughter had a birthday while we were there and the staff decorated the villa and came in singing happy birthday with a cake !! A very nice touch.

The 4 bedroom villas have beautiful large pools and even a toilet and shower next to the pool. All bedrooms are large with ensuites making the villas ideal for even 4 couples. The rooms are separate and private, the only minor negative being you go outside to get to the rooms upstairs, rather than just moving around inside. This wasn't an issue to us, with adult children but might be to others with small children.

After the really good reviews prior to going, we went with high expectations and it's fair to say our expectations were exceeded. Everyone from Lisa who did the bookings and changes we made so efficiently to to whole team in Seminyak were great, and made our holiday a delight. Nothing was a bother, even when our plane home was cancelled, the manager was available to personally drive us to the airport to sort it out at a moments notice. 

If you are looking for somewhere to relax and enjoy your holiday in Bali this is it.
title: Beautiful villas with exceptional staff

text:
I recently stayed at the O Villas in Seminyak for 5 nights with my family. When we first arrived we were blown away with the size of the Villa.. Massive is an understatement. We had 4 large bedrooms all with their own big bathrooms. The kitchen / living area was fantastic and even provided a projector screen with a choice of different movies. The pool was large and suited us really well. 

We were traveling with three young children so we pre-organised to have pool fencing installed for our stay for approx 30USD a day. When traveling with young children you do need to be careful as the stairs are quiet steep. 

Breakfast was served fresh to order every morning. Although the portions were a little small for us, they provided extra food for us as requested. 

The location of the villas isn't the best but we didnt have any issues with it, as the complimentary shuttle service to Seminyak Square was always available when requested. 

The butler service was great! Rooms were cleaned daily and room service was quick and easy. Couldn't have asked for better service.

From the moment you are collected in their private vehicle the experience is first class.  The villas are very fresh and luxurious with everything you need. The little extras make all the difference and you can see their eye to detail with stocked fridge (at shop prices), full amenities and free high speed wifi.

The Chef does a great job with a full cooked breakfast each day and they have a full 'villa' service menu available.  Should you want anything specific they will go shop for the ingredients and cook for you rather than going out every night all at cost price plus a small mark up.

The vehicle isn't just for airport transfer and was available for any local journeys to markets or restaurants.  They were just a call away from coming to collect you as well.

We'd been to Seminyak on several occasions but wanted to try somewhere different. Using TripAdvisor we found O Villas which seemed ideal. From the moment we booked until the moment we left the service couldn't have been better. 
Don't let the little road leading up to the villas put you off. What awaits you won't disappoint.
We stayed in the one bedroom villa. So much space for 2 people. Perfectly appointed and the huge balcony terrace on which breakfast was served daily was amazing. If we were to be very picky, the pool was on the small side but served it's purpose on a hot day.
The staff were amazing. They did as much or as little as we needed them to do. Always ready to help you or drive you wherever you needed to go.
One of the highlights was being driven to dinner in the 1973 jeep. 
Just don't wear a short skirt ladies!
We would go back in a heart beat. Had a look at a 4 bedroom villa and are thinking about revisiting with friends.

text:
We returned to O Villas 11 months after our previous stay.

We drove down the dodgy lane way and suddenly we were home, lots of smiling faces Yanti greeted us with "Welcome home" and that is just what it felt like.

The problem with writing a review for O Villas is that one tends to use and eventually run out of superlatives. Please read my previous review  in April 2014.

For the most part the staff are the same, Richard and Kadek have moved on, but Yanti is still there and is ably supported by Bayu and Not forgetting Ketut. During our stay was Silence Day which in itself is an interesting experience, but, Bayu took very good care of us and we had a lovely dinner, picked from the in house dining menu.

O Villas staff work as a team, everyone plays their part as nobody would dream of letting the team down. Sure from time to time language barriers can create some confusion, but, very few of the Balinese I have dealt with will ask you to explain what you want, so you can benefit from clarifying your requests.

Will I stay at O Villas again? The answer is a definite yes; it's a great place to stay, staffed by terrific people. Thank you O Villas for a great holiday.
title: Down the dodgy lane to paradise

Had the pleasure of staying at the O Villas for four nights to end our two week Bali holiday.. It was like staying in a five star hotel with the space and comfort of an amazing villa.

We stayed in one night and had a three course meal prepared by the Villas chef, the meat was one of the best steaks I've had I a long time, satays and salads just rounded a perfect meal. text:
It was our honeymoon, and we better had chosen our place of stay with utmost care. Well thanks to fellow TripAdvisor friends and their reviews, we made a choice to stay at O Villas. That was the best decision we took.
My wife was just speechless about the serenity around the villa. We stayed at the lone one-bedroom villa with private pool, and it was just like home away from home. To begin with, the pool is on the ground floor, where as the room is on the first floor. Not a deterrent but this somewhat made me feel we ended up under using the pool. But the time we used the pool, there was nothing we could complain about. Yes, it was on the lower floor and we had to take the stairs every time, but hey, when the whole villa is for us to enjoy, and secured by a door, what more to worry?

The service just keeps getting better by the day, as they get to know your taste of food. The butler service was just what we needed to pamper us to the core. They were courteous enough to wait for us to serve food, however long we made them wait. The quality of food served was amazing.

The villa was made up every time we came back home. This was a real challenge for the staff, given that we had literally made the place a mess with pillows and food littered all around. The bedroom was neat and had a very comfortable bed. The only complaint  though is that, the air-conditioning in the bedroom could have been better or the AC more strategically placed.

Every time we had to go out, be it on a sight seeing, or drop us off somewhere and pick us back, the vehicles were ready for us, well kept and cooled. We just had to hop on.

In all, if we were to visit Bali again, there is no way we can stay at a place other than O Villas.
title: Oh!! Villas - Mesmerizing

Just got back from 10 nights in the O Villas staying in Villa 2.  This was our 3rd time in Bali in 5 years, always stayed in beach front resorts but this time travelling with a 7, 5 & 2 y.o. we opted to give a villa a go.  We will definitely be doing the villa option again thanks to our experience at the O Villas, thanks in a big part to their staff. 
Staff - every single member of the team could not do enough for us.  They are awesome and were excellent with our kids.  The on site babysitting option is very good.  The overall service is excellent.
Location - only short walk to shops, but with the 2 best drivers in Bali, who needs to walk.  We were picked up and dropped off where ever we wanted to go.  Beats taxis and walking. 
Facilities - the place is not brand new but is extremely well kept and very clean.  Shower pressure was not perfect but it was still good and WiFi was perfect.  Kids loved the projector and we watched the footy finals live in our living room.
A nice surprise was the membership at the Canggu Club - we went there 4 times, mum and dad used the gym, relaxed by the pool and drank cocktails and kids played all day at the brand new water park, plus there heaps more things to do a the club.  Worth checking out and the best part, you get dropped off and picked up when you require (within reason).
We will be back, excellent value for money experience delivered by a team that could not do enough to help you enjoy your experience.  Thanks O Villas.

The Canggu Club has been undergoing a transformation and with the new 'Splash' waterpark and 'Bounce' now open there is plenty of fun for the whole family. Thankyou for your kind comments on our villa staff and drivers we really enjoy hearing how we contributed to your holiday experience. We hope to see you and your family back at O Villas again soon.

text:
My fiancée and I stayed at O Villas for four nights (taking advantage of their ‘free nights special’ – excellent value) and just had the most wonderful time. 

Arriving late at the airport, it was such a welcome sight to see our driver waiting for us to whisk us off to our villa. He came prepared with cold water and cold face towels, perfect after a six hour flight! 

O Villas isn’t too far from the airport (maybe half an hour?) so excellent first destination if you plan on travelling around Indonesia. 

When we arrived, we were greeted by the head butler Ketut who showed us into the one-bedroom villa, which was just AMAZING. 

Firstly – it’s massive. We couldn’t believe we had so much space all to ourselves! 
You have a smallish private pool when you first walk in with two lounges, then up some stairs to the enormous balcony (where breakfast is delivered every morning) which also has some lounges and a day bed. 

Moving inside you have a living room area with fully-stocked mini-bar fridge, TV, couches etc. and then onto the bedroom. 

SUCH a comfortable bed!!! Four poster with mosquito netting (though we didn't see a single mosquito while we were there) and just lovely and so comfy. In fact, sleep quality at O Villas is second to none. 

Leading off from the bedroom is a walk-in wardrobe type space (perfect to dump luggage) and then the bathroom, which was excellent - no bath but two showers! 

But what really makes O Villas stand out is the service. 

Our butlers were just so lovely and would do anything and everything to make sure you have a perfect stay. When they discovered I was a fan of gin & tonics, the fridge all of a sudden was stocked with as much tonic water, ice and lime a girl could wish for! Likewise with my fiancée and his fondness for Bintangs – the staff (without being asked) brought an esky filled with ice and beer for him. Amazing!

After Seminyak we were headed to Gili T and Ketut managed to organise a return transfer at (literally) half the original price. Lesson here: if you want something done, ask Ketut! 

As the other reviews have detailed here, O Villas isn’t in the thick of Seminyak but there are two cars each with a driver which will take you and pick you up from anywhere you wish to go. It was super easy to get around and we never had ANY trouble booking the cars. (And even if you did, it is about a $1 cab ride into town.) 

One thing I will note is that the staff will let themselves into your villa unannounced so just be aware – even though you have your own villa, you aren’t as ‘private’ as you may imagine. So those keen on naked sunbathing, you have been warned! 

All in all, a fantastic stay. We will be back!!
title: Beautiful villa with outstanding service
