title: Nice new Villas

text: Stayed for a week in Villa 3, had a great time there. The premise is huge, we had 8 people and did not feel crowded at all. The pool was nice and the big living room with the large screen TV was really good to hang out in. The hotel staff is very friendly and accommodating. We hired a van and a driver from the villa for 5 days. On most days, we spent more than 10 hours, and they did not charge extra for the time (the daily rate includes 10 hours). I also asked for a special breakfast (an eight egg white and two whole egg omelet) and they accommodate that request as well. The driver also took us to Carrefour to do some shopping for our beach picnic. They even let us stay till 4pm on the check-out date for free because we have a late flight out of Bali. Overall, awesome experience. The only caveat is the low water pressure and the poor wifi coverage (the staff said they are in the process of replacing their router). Would definitely come back if I'm going to stay in Seminyak again.
title: Excellent villa!

text:
Loved this villa! We were on holiday with family and were in villa 3, 4 rooms and with our own private pool. The pictures just don't do this place justice. It's huge! Our room was massive, with a huge walk in shower and a bath. And very, very clean.
I loved the pool, a good size if you want to wake up with a few laps in the morning, and very private.
All the staff were fantastic, from making our breakfast in the morning, I recommend the omelettes, to driving us to the markets or taking us to a restaurant at night. 
The living area was great, plenty of space to relax out of the sun and enjoy a beer, while watching a film on the BIG screen, they have a projector that pulls down from the ceiling. Very cool. 
Overall, I felt this was the perfect base for our trip to bali, so many great restaurants and bars with live music close by, we loved Frankensteins and Zappas, and also really easy to get to Ubud or Kuta. 
We were really spoiled here and can't wait to go back!
title: Amazing!

text:
From the moment we arrived to the moment we left was a tremendous experience. We arrived at the airport with the driver from the villa to collect us with a cold towel and a bintang beer. The staff at the accommodation were so helpful and would do anything for you. The villas were immaculate and very well looked after. They were absolutely stunning.  It was like having a little family looking after you.  The pool was excellent too just being able to get up in the morning and go for a swim was great.  

You could book the driver if you wished and we were able to experience bali with the experience of a local who was able to give you information that you would never had known. We booked the driver for the day and went to the safari park and ubud to the monkey forest. Well worth a visit.  

We could not fault this villa and will certainly be returning.  A fantastic accommodation.
title: Fantastic accommodation

text:
We have just returned from an 11 night holiday at O'Villa's along with my brother and his family from the UK. For us coming from Perth it was our 5th visit to Bali and I can honestly say that it was the best holiday we have had on the island so far and for my brother and his family it was the perfect place to stay for his first visit. I arranged the holiday and when I booked I was looking for something that would make him want to come to back and staying at O'Villa's has certainly done that. It is the perfect place to stay and spend quality time with family. 

We stayed in one of the four bed villa's which was absolutely immaculate in terms of cleanliness and also décor, it is visually stunning, very comfortable and has been designed in such a way that it is impossible not to relax and have a wonderful time.

As others have said the airport transfers were great with cold towels and cold drinks provided on pick up however it was on our arrival at the villa where we were greeted with nice tunes playing on the quality sound system, more cold towels and a delicious ice tea for all that we knew we had hit the jackpot. 

The staff attended to our every need in a very professional manner and always with smiles on their faces. The housekeeping was excellent as were the breakfasts, room service and dinners in the evening. The quality of the O'Villa meals were up there with some of the best restaurants we ate in and at a reasonable price too. The mini-bar and room service prices were also very affordable compared to some resorts I have stayed in and the room service food was of a high standard. 

The other facilities in the Villa were awesome, the pool was a delight for all and the projector screen was enjoyed by our younger kids to watch movies at night whilst the adults relaxed outside in the ambient night time atmosphere. The living area was beautifully furnished and comfortable for all eight of us to relax in on the odd occasion we were not in the pool area. We were all very impressed with the transport service and we had no problems organizing our lifts to and from Seminyak and the beach. We also used the villa drivers to go to Kuta on two occasions and for a day tour which whilst at an additional cost was no more than other transport would have been and was more convenient.

I must also add that the staff, whilst very professional, were also great with the kids.

To sum up the whole experience was outstanding and we would not hesitate to book O'Villa's again.

Particular thanks to Ketut, Yanti, Kadek, Agus, Bayu and the chefs.

Sampai jumpa lagi!
title: Outstanding, did not want to leave!
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: I cannot rate O Villas highly enough. We were a group of 12 - 6 adults and 6 kids - and we had a ball. The staff are so efficient, friendly and accommodating too and the food is to die for. Thanks so much for a great holiday.
title: Restful, relaxing and wonderful

text:
Only stayed one night however we were treated like royalty. The villa we stayed in was very private with our own swimming pool. The rooms were all one would want with television, stereo, IPod docking station as well as adequate WIFI. Bedroom, kitchen and bathroom were spotless.    

I do not think I have ever had service as good as this ever. (Thanks). 

If we ever decide to return to Bali this accommodation will be our first pick.

We went to the local market and area for dinner and had the best time. 

Thanks to the helpful staff for going out of their way to help us get to the airport on time. All of you were great.
title: Top class service

text: Our 1st time to Bali....what a find! Absolute luxury, awesome value for money, 5 star service and always with a smile. The staff were amazing,nothing to much to ask. Richard was fantastic and deserves an extra special mention, the pool so inviting and clean after a day out exploring the amazing area. The drivers were helpful and up for a chat. The rooms clean, great lay out, well air conditioned, food from breakfast to dinner was fantastic....so fresh and delicious and delivered to your Villa!. Our trip to Bali was an amazing holiday experience. Thank you "O" Villas!
title: Seminyaks Best Kept Secret
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: We decided on O Villas for our annual girl's trip to Bali after hours of research, and we couldn't have chosen a better place!  We were blown away by the level of service - pickup at the airport, meet and greet at the villa with an explanation of all the facilities, butler service by the lovely Kadek and drop off and pickup around Seminyak.  When we first booked with Lisa (who happened to be in Perth), all our requests were sorted efficiently i.e. twin beds (really only suitable for children; we ended up sharing the massive main bed), (very) late checkout for NO CHARGE!  We took advantage of the early bird booking - 7 nights for the price of 5 which turned out to be terrific value.  The villa is a little bit further out than some villas, however, the drop off and pickup service made up for this, and taxi drivers would always (eventually) agree to 20,000 RUP (AUD $2.00) from Seminyak Central, so very cheap.  I walked into Seminyak Square once and it took around 25 minutes, so only a few minutes by car.  The facilities at O Villas are fabulous, and we especially enjoyed the air conditioned kitchen / lounge area, the lovely pool area as well as the blender for making our cocktails.  We were very reluctant to order a meal through the villa after a bad experience at another villa last year, but we decided to try it.  It was one of our nicest meals - we each paid AUD $15 and the staff did the shopping and cooking whilst we lounged by the pool.  It was then served up and they even made us up some iced tea.  Spectacular service!  We really couldn't fault a thing at O Villas, and are currently making plans to come back and stay next year.  I really don't think we could find a better place and such great value.  Thank you to all the staff - Security, Cooks, Butlers, Drivers - you do a fabulous job and we really appreciated all you did for us!
title: We will be back!

text: Definately one of Seminyak's best kept secrets, O Villas has been one of the most relaxing stays i've ever had in my many trips to Bali. Just minutes from Seminyaks main 'Eat Street' - Jl. Oberoi, O Villas is tucked away down its own private driveway, away from the noise and bustle of town. We started our trip with a transfer at the airport, picked up by the Ovilla staff, greeted with a bintang & a cold towel on arrival! Luv It! They then transferred us down to our beautiful villa - number 3, with a huge pool, lounge and kitchen - with a projector screen (which i was wrapped about...). Over the next few days, we really didn't do much except laze by the pool! The staff were amazing, catered to our every need, and even cooked us dinner - and Ill tell ya something - one of the best Nasi Goreng's I've ever had. Oh, and the beds are amazing - I even asked if I could take one home!!! Out of all the places ive stayed in Seminyak over the years, the attention to detail, the staff, the surroundings are all fantastic - so worth a look. Thank you very much to every one at O Villa for looking after us! Its was an absolute delight!
title: Fantastic - What a Find!!!

text: Well positioned, quiet, with 5 star surroundings. The staff were knowledgeable and were only too happy to help with any request. The villa itself was very clean with a all your needs covered. The bed was so comfortable I bought the same one when I got home. I haven't slept that well for years. The free shuttle service was well organised and the drivers knew all the spots throughout Bali. Check O Villas out as I would definitely stay again.
title: Relax in Seminyak
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: This place was a hidden gem, nestled in a quiet location but within walking distance to the hustle and bustle of everything Seminyak has to offer. The villa was in immaculate condition, cleaned daily and the staff couldn’t do more for us. Everything we wanted was on hand. Ketut, Tommy and all the staff were fantastic, it was a perfect first visit for our teenager who enjoyed the large pool and home away from home feel. We have already booked to visit again. If you are thinking about a villa stay look no further than O Villas.
title: Amazing Hidden Villa in Seminyak

text:
From the greeting at the airport to the drop off for the flight home, the staff never stop smiling.
Rooms are spacious, clean and welcoming. 
Kitchen/lounge area is very large and perfect for dinners 
Nothing is too hard laundry, money change, breakfast, restaurant bookings and transfers are all easily arranged.
Was lucky enough to meet one of the owners whilst we stayed and what a true gentleman very friendly and helpful 
Location is right in the heart 
Eat street is a 5 minute walk and petitenget 5 minutes the other way perfect !!!
Thanks will definitely be returning
title: Simply perfect

text: This is a huge 4 seperate bedroom villa that’s got plenty of space, a great pool, terrific lounge space and dining also. But who wants to eat at home when all the top restaurants are close by anyway! Loved it so much booked again for Janurary.
title: One of the best villas in Bali, hands down.

text: Overall a very pleasant and enjoyable stay. It's great to see Bali starting to bounce back after the last couple of years. The staff here are wonderful and really accommodating. The breakfasts were great and set us up for the day exploring and sight seeing. The villas are clean, very spacious and quietly located. The pool was great and lovely way to finish off the day (especially with a Bintang). Couldn't have wanted more.
title: Bali's bouncing back - what a great week!

text:
O Villas is the perfect holiday home! Despite the ongoing challenges of COVID, Ketut and his team have been working hard to make sure our stay was perfect! Starting from a pickup from the busy Denpasar airport, the team made sure our trip was effortless! They helped communicate with some tour operators and accommodated early breakfast boxes when we had an early departure one morning. Speaking of breakfast, every item on the O Villas breakfast menu was delicious, fresh, and well-presented. Accompanied by coffee, toast, and fresh fruit, every day had an amazing start! 

Located in a quiet street in Seminyak, O Villas is situated in a great area. A short walk to amazing restaurants, spas, and the main shopping street, the villas feel like an island oasis despite being close to the hustle of Seminyak. The staff were also very accommodating and dropped us off/picked us up in the villa van around Seminyak at no additional cost! 

The villa itself is well maintained, clean, and comfortable. The pool is always clean and towels are refreshed daily as well. My friend and I enjoyed the large beds, and as two female travellers, felt safe knowing that the O Villas staff were always on duty and keeping an eye on the villas! 

Thank you again to Ketut, Tommy, and the rest of the O Villa team! I'm already planning my next stay!!
title: Amaxing Seminyak Accomodation

text: Just love this place - despite the challenges of Covid and no tourists they have kept their excellent staff employed and they have worked hard to maintain standards throughout.  The breakfast was fantastic each day and the fridge always stocked with cold drinks.  We used the vehicle a fair bit for trips out - not only great value but also super safe with reliable drivers.  A little corner of paradise and look forward to returning.
title: Thriving after the Covid break

text:
So good to be back at the wonderful O Villas in Seminyak. This was my second visit and equally as good as my first. 
Ketut and his team looked after us with the usual care and extra mile service, they couldn't do enough for us and I am missing those home cooked Indonesian breakfasts already!
Huge thanks to you and the team Ketut - see you again soon!
title: Another great stay at the O Villas

text:
So excited to be heading to O Villas again in September, this will be my fifth time. 
Such a warm welcome from start to finish, the staff are so friendly, cannot do enough for you and they have great knowledge of the area. 
I love the fact that the villas are very private but also close enough to walk to restaurants and bars nearby. Although the staff are happy to drive you around the local area. 
The staff serve an excellent breakfast of your choice and if required, you can order lunch or dinner, which we have done several times. 
The bedrooms are so spacious and have everything you need with lovely decor. 
Can’t wait be back there!
title: Fabulous place to stay

text: O Villas is an oasis of luxury in Seminyak. The staff are excellent. They have a great deal of local knowledge and will provide advice on all activities and visits you may want to do. The home cooked local food is very high quality and I particularly enjoyed the breakfasts. There are also some fantastic local restaurants a few minutes walk away which have happy hours and provide local cuisine. This is a place where you will return again and again. What a find!
title: Get-together

text: Excellent staff. Very accommodating. Great food. Good location. Huge open living area. Huge rooms. Clean rooms. Shuttle bus service is great. Optiona to hire a driver and nanny avaliable. So happy we stayed here. Would recommend for large families or multiple families.
title: Beautiful

text: Visited the villas early in December with some friends. It was my first visit to Bali and part of a trip combined with Perth . The first thing to say it was an amazing experience. The staff are very helpful and will pretty much do anything to make sure you are happy . From booking trips to arranging transport to making breakfast I don’t want to single out anyone as they were are great . The location was spot on just a short walk to some lovely bars and restaurants or if needed you can get a lift into town . The villas themselves are just as advertised. Lots of room , great pool , excellent showers and with air con which was needed . Will hopefully return within the next couple of years and look forward to seeing all the team again then .
title: Bali at its best

text: Stayed at O Villas and it was amazing. All the rooms are large, the pool clean and the staff great. Having staff come in every morning and cook for us was special too. I spent my 50th birthday there and we ordered the BBQ which I highly recomend. The lovely staff even decorated  while I was out before they cooked the magnificent BBQ. 10/10
title: Great place for families

text: Cannot recommend O Villa's enough. Manager Ketut and staff go out of their way to make your stay amazing. Breakfast is big and beautiful. Rooms spacious, pool is fantastic. Driver's can be organised at the Villa for day trips all over Bali, again nothing is to much trouble. If you are a couple or a large family O Villa's are the place to stay. It was my daughter's birthday while we were their. They decorated the living room and surprised her with a beautiful cake and of course singing Happy Birthday.
title: Bowe family birthday

text:
Thank you O Villa, our holiday was exceptional.
The Entire Staff made our ten nights stay in your spacious one bedroom villa with private pool, one of our best vacation experiences in Bali. Our complete satisfaction was primarily due to the care and attention delivered each and every day by the O Villa Team. The Manager Katut was professional, quickly addressed our concerns graciously, advised us and was always available. We will miss the cheerful and eager staff members, Agust, Tommy, Wayan, security, chef, and all those persons I have not mentioned yet, provided outstanding service during our stay. We hope to return next year with our family. Teramakaci :)
title: O-Villa*****What a great holiday!

text:
Let me first start by answering one simple question, would I stay there again?

Answer:    Absolutely

Great setup, awesome staff.   

A little more maintenance around the villa would bring it back up to resort quality.    Did this spoil my enjoyment of the villa?     No, we really enjoyed the villa and would book it again.

The only other observation I would have on the negative side, is the showers could be better cleaned.     Some bleech to kill small traces of mould appearing, and give the shower screens a scrub to get rid of soap scum starting to build up.

Having said this, the rooms and bathroom are clean, large, and inviting.

On the positive side.    
-   Projector for watching movies.    
-   Kitchen & Large Fridge/Freezer.
-   Staff are very attentaive
-   They cook your breakfast in your villa, to your order.   No buffet breakfast here :)
-   Breakfast was awesome.

We often could not eat everything they cooked for us, which did leave the staff sometimes a little concerned that we did not like there food.      We LOVED there cooking.

We decided to go shopping and pickup our own supplies and stock the fridge with water, drinks and nibbles.        You can purchase their soft drinks and nibblies, and they do offer free bottles of water.

Ther laundry service is very reasonably priced, and takes the hassle of having to keep going to the local laundry person.
title: Quiet, Peaceful, Secluded

text:
Came to Bali for a relaxing time and couldn’t have asked for better accommodation. Back off main streets and very quiet. 

4 bedroom villas are really nice and spacious with heaps of room and private full size pool.

Everyone at O Villas are amazing. Fantastic service and our villa cooked breakfast each morning was fantastic (especially the pancakes with chocolate sauce). The in-house cooked dinner was amazing too.

We used the vIlla driver Wayan for all of our tours and he is amazing. Free shuttle around Seminyak is also available. Approx 10 minute walk and you are in Seminyak Square. Couple of close really nice restaurants - Warung Rumpi (really cold Bintang) and Basil Kitchen (dishes are fresh and tasty and only 50,000 ($5) a dish).

Highly recommend and will definitely be back.
title: Amazing Villas

text: My wife and I recently stayed at the o villas for 10 nights, the staff ,amenities ,breakfast, shuttle bus accomodation were all first class, location was perfect being a little bit away from nightclubs etc but close enough to walk. I would recommend the o villas very highly and a special mention to tommy who was always cheerful and nothing was a problem . Thankyou again max
title: Relaxed

text: We stayed at O’Villas for 9 days in September with our children aged 3 and 6 and had a fabulous time! The villas are large with a big swimming pool and plenty of living space inside and outside – the open plan kitchen/living area is perfect and for night-time in particular to avoid mosquitos as we have stayed in other villas with only outside living space that were not ideal for us. The team of staff at O’Villas are simply brilliant and could not be more helpful – they take your order for breakfast and then cook in your villa for you each morning which was excellent food and lots of choice; omelettes were amazing and the kids loved the pancakes! The villas are walking distance to many nice restaurants and Tommy and the team were always on hand if we needed to catch a lift anywhere and great in helping organise day trips for us. Our relatives (4 adults and 3 children) stayed in the villa next door so in total there were 11 people and our experience at O’Villas was fantastic all round. We will definitely return!
title: Family holiday

text: Very Enjoyable trip . Hassle free. The place is clean and they served excellent breakfast. Affordable day trips too... very convenient to arrange transport to bring us to n fro the villa within semiyak. Butler and staff very very friendly. Very suitable for family w old folks or young kids. The pool is maintained and clean daily.
title: Very enjoyable and hassle free trip
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
We stayed in a 4 x bedroom villa with our own pool and had an amazing holiday!! The villas are beautiful with all 4 x bedrooms having king size beds, huge en-suites and 2 x of them had baths as well. 
The staff were fabulous and the loveliest people you could ever meet and did everything they could to make our holiday perfect. There was a breakfast menu to select from and they’d ask for the time we wanted to eat and they would come into our villa set the table, cook our breakfast and serve it to us. There is a selection of both western and Indonesian breakfasts which pleased even the fussiest eaters and our food was always phenomenal. After breakfast they would ask what our plans were for the day in case we needed to be driven anywhere and would set about organising that for us as well if needed.
The pool was huge and easily accommodated all of us for games of ‘Marco Polo’ and pool volleyball matches. 
Honestly, I can’t rave enough about this place and the amazing time we had here as we  loved our villa and the staff were what made our holiday truly wonderful!!
title: Amazing!!!

text:
This was our second visit to O Villas and again was superb! We lacked for nothing, everything we wanted was there.The freshly cooked and served breakfast each morning was delicious with lots of fresh fruit. The Villa itself was lovely, spacious, clean & tastefully furnished.The pool was great as well & the staff could not do enough for us throughout our week's stay.
The free daily transport in & out of Seminyak was another lovely touch.
Can't wait to return again next year!!!

Wendy & Dave Tavistock Devon England
title: Superb Villas.......Amazing Staff.

text:
Great one bed villa with private pool. Pool is private but on a lower level, so if you are not fit, you soon will be!
Villa in good condition, if a little dated. Cleaning fairly perfunctory, but adequate. Staff could not be more helpful. 
We had a wonderful relaxing week at O Villas. The only downside was the lack of a lock on the pool level door. Would stay again. 😊
title: Excellent villa

text:
We were at O Villas 3 years ago and always said we would return.  We stayed over the New Year period and were again blown away by the service.

Many of the staff that were at the villa during our previous stay were still at O Villa which speaks volumes for the way they enjoy what they do and the way they are treated by the owners.  Nothing is too much trouble for the team.

Despite 3 years of guests the Villa is in top condition and must get constant maintenance to keep it looking so fresh and appealing.

Thanks again to the team - we will return!!

Peter
title: Return trip delivered same first class service

text:
Recently stayed 5 nights in the 1 bed pool villa. The villa was extremely spacious and clean. Although starting to look a little tired the villa was well maintained & clean.  The air con could do with being updated as although adequate it could be a little cooler & a little quieter (air con noisy). Seen better days I think.  Ceiling fans in both rooms was a bonus. 

The TV, stereo & DVD in the lounge room was awesome, although was rarely used. Would be better if the TV in the bedroom was also a DVD player however not an issue but would be a nice alternative.  Electronics a little outdated as well as no option for Bluetooth including seperate iPod docking station speaker that is not current with new iPhones. 

Unusual set up of the 1 bed villa with the private pool being located on a lower level (entry to villa) & the villa itself located on an an upper level with approx 14 steps & steep staircase.  Would've preferred all being on the same level. 

The breakfast included with the room rate was delicious & varied & delivered at time appropriate to you in the villa. They even come back approx 30 mins after serving it to collect the used items.  Although a nice touch I think this would be more appropriate to collect when they clean the room whilst you are out unless otherwise requested. 

The staff also come into your villa at dusk to switch the outside & pool lights on & to remove the cushions on the outdoor furniture.  I feel this a little intrusive but they are very discreet.  Would be nice if they left the pools towels though as it's nice to have a quick swim when getting back to the villa after having dinner out. 

The staff are amazingly friendly & eager to help with any request.  This alone would persuade me to stay in these villas again. 

The villas are also in a great location with many restaurants & markets close by. They also offer free transport to/from the airport as well as the Seminyak area.  This itself is a massive positive for me. 

A special mention to Katut who was most welcoming & friendly throughout our entire stay.  Would definitely recommend the OVillas for a stay in Seminyak.
title: Nice Villa Amazing Staff

text: Just returned from a holiday in Bali, staying at our favourite accommodation, Ovillas, in Seminyak.  Delightful staff, fabulous food and a great stay all round I would definitely recommend Ovillas to anyone wanting to visit Bali.
title: Ovillas review

text: This place is amazing! The breakfast was so good. I loved all the staff. They work so hard to make sure you’re having a good trip. Kadek was our driver quite a few times and my kids loved hearing his stories. He was so kind to my children ages 13, 11 and 10. The kids LOVED staying in the nice rooms and swimming in the pool. My father in law had a massage every morning. It was a nice start to his day. Only $8USD/hour. I would definitely come here again!
title: Great place to stay!

text:
I organised a work trip to Bali in May and we had 2 x 4 bedroom villas next door to each other and 1 x 1 bedroom villa. 
I stayed in a 4 bedroom villa and as a whole it was great but the bathrooms could probably use a revamp.
 
The service we received was amazing. The staff were so friendly and always there to help. Breakfast was always on time and delicious! Whenever we needed a ride somewhere they were always available and they even offered to pick us up if we needed. I have never stayed at a villa in Bali with this sort of service.

I would stay again if I get the chance.
title: The staff are second to none!

text: We have just returned from our first trip to Bali, staying at O Villas for 5 nights. The villa was lovely, clean and spacious pool also very clean. All the staff were wonderful, friendly and very helpful with anything you asked them e.g. good recommendations for restaurants in Seminyak ( Happy Chappy, Ginger Moon and Ultimo). The breakfast was very good and made to order in the villa at your requested time. The room service was also of a high standard. Chauffeur service was also very good taking you and bringing you back from restaurants. We did a tour to Ubud one of the days with one of the drivers from the villas. You must have a night at Frankenstein’s - a great night out. Finns Beach Club was first class and staff looked after us all day. Great first trip to Bali, hopefully we will return some day.
title: Lovely stay at O Villas

text: I had to do write a second review to reinforce that this is a wonderful villa 1  to stay in. I have had many trips to Bali and this is the 1st villa i have stayed in twice, as i loved it so much last time. We where greeted at airport by Kadek and taken promptly to our air conditioned villa.Your breakfast order ie nasi goreng, pancakes or full cooked breakfast is taken the night before and cooked at your desired time. Juice is fresh juice with fruit platter, pastries, toast and tea and coffee. The aircon worked very well and our room was always cool when we arrived back. The living area was large with great aircon as well as water cooler. The fridge was stocked with ice and drinks and you just used as desired, at a reasonable price and where billed at check out.Snack foods ie peanuts and pringles where also available. Security was always in place and we felt very safe. The pool was always clean and a lovely temperature. Rooms where cleaned very well. The courtesy driver Kadek was fantastic. We just had to ask and the driver would drive us to restaurants, spas or shopping. Then would pick us up as well a fantastic service for the 6 of us, even though we all did different things. Kadek even helped us when TV wouldn't work at 10 pm. We just hope our tips where divided evenly. We noticed our money was dived into an envelope by the sullen looking head maid, when the staff where outside. We appreciated the drivers, cleaning and cooking staff evenly and hope the tips are distributed fairly.
title: Had to stay a second time

text:
We stayed arrived into Bali very early on Sunday April 1st. As there were 7 of us (Family of 5 and the grandparents visiting from Denmark) we needed 2 vans to take us to the hotel. Mr Kadek and Mr Katut where on hand to collect us. As our Villa was only being vacated that day, we were unable to check in early. The staff were most apologetic about it and offered to hold our bags and drive us into the Seminyak Square where we could get some light shopping and breakfast.
Right from the get go, the staff were brilliant. The offer a free shuttle anywhere in Seminyak till very late, so we were able to easily get around. The Villa we stayed in lovely, spacious and clean. The pool was fantastic, with plenty of pool toys for the kids. The Villa itself is extremely private, which we absolutely loved.
The room service was excellent, where we had chosen to stay in for lunch and dinner some days. (A few more Indonesian choices wouldn't go amiss though. But still, excellent quality, excellent prices!)
The free breakfast was second to none. The choices were extensive and they would come into the villa and cook it for you, right there so everything was so fresh. You had a Nespresso machine in the villa so you could have coffee anytime you wanted for a very reasonable price. Loads of sodas/beers(for excellent prices)/water cooler - so we didn't need to go to the supermarket once! (That has (in all our travels) has never happened!!)
The staff were just lovely. Always smiling, always polite, always interested. That makes such a difference when staying in hotels/resorts. Couldn't fault them once! Lovely people.
We'll be coming back for sure.
One thing I will mention, and it shouldn't deter people staying there. It could do with a touch up of paint. There should also be other options for payment to settle the room service charges. (Their credit card machine wasn't working and we had to get out cash which we didn't have enough of so had to go to an atm, something we wanted to avoid as you end up getting pinged for a bit) The staff were super apologetic and it wasn't their fault at all. Just something the owners could do. (Offer other options ie PayPal )
title: Watch out O Villas. We're coming back!

text:
we had stayed at o villas for 3 days, ist a nice one bedroom villa, positive is its spacious, very nice staff , car facality to seminyak area, very nice breakfast exclusively vegetarian they prepared for us , negative is its bit isolated , located in a small street adjacent to banana farm and pool was on ground floor so lack of privacy and not much convinient to use.
        but any way its always better to visit beach club in seminyak.

text:

location gr8

text:
The place was simply amazing! We just LOVED it! It’s away from all the crowd and chaos of a big resort while hosting all the great things we could ask for in a popular part of Bali!

The rooms and facilities were more than adequate. The pool was great except it was not sloped – 1.5m all the way which was tough for my 5 year old! The staff was amazing – very caring, humble and supportive. The breakfast options are fixed few but great taste – cooked right in the villa kitchen by the chef! The great value adds are the transport – airport to and from transfers as well as roaming nearby at no extra charge (we didn’t need it as we had our fulltime car but can be great for others)!

I’m recommending my friends and family to stay there if that suits the travel plan! We are definitely going back in future and will look forward to stay again. Thanks team.
title: A self-sufficient lavish private place with all hands trying to make your stay the best!

owner_response.text: Hello, thankyou for your fantasic review of our villas. It sounds like you had a wonderful family holiday. We know we have achieved a great guest stay when you are willing to recommend to your friends and family, thankyou again we hope to see you all again at O Villas soon.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed in O Villas for the first time early Nov 17. We had a 4 bed villa for 4 girls and was perfect for us. The pool is large , sparkling clean and gets a good amount of sun so the temperature for swimming was perfect for us. The rooms and bathrooms are spacious well maintained and lovely and clean. We also enjoyed the living area which could be closed of and kept cool, which was also very spacious. Breakfasts were fantastic as many other reviews have commented and we found the location to be perfect for us. Still close to walk to a few lovely Warungs (Kultur being one to try) and convenience shops a short walk. BEst of all are the staff at Ovillas, so helpful and nothing is to much trouble. A big thanks to Kutut Tommy Yanti and all the team for looking after us. There is a large team so someone is always around if you need anything. The other great thing is the availability of the car for drop and pick up which was most appreciated and we found a big plus. Big thanks to  Kadek who often drove us with always a smile and we had a great laugh and many interesting conversations. THe booking process was also extremely easy and Lisa was a big help answering our many questions prior to booking. Also a plus for us being able to pay in AUD just simplifies everything. THanks Lisa. Overall so many pluses and nothing to fault. We come to Bali at least twice a year but seldom return to the same villa, but we are already making plans to come back to OVillas next year. Just perfect and thank you.
title: Fantastic Girls Stay

text: Having been to Bali many times this trip for my family was about relaxation and that's exactly what we got. We were thrilled with the very large villa, easily could accomodate 2 families in the 4 bdr villa. It was spacious, light and relatively modern. The pool was a large family size, with ample lounges for everyone. Each bedroom had its own bathroom. The staff were fantastic, so accomodating, friendly and even made my birthday something extra special by decorating the villa & making a cake! We would definitely recommend this villa to anyone and would look to stay here again when we next visit. Thanks to all the staff we had an amazing holiday.
title: The perfect getaway!

text:
After getting over Ubud I decided to relax quietly in Seminyak. I was fortunate enough to come across O Villas. This was the beginning of the most wonderful 24h. The staff were very accommodating to my early arrival and greeted me with the most welcoming smile. I was truly welcome in their slice of paradise. 
The Villa itself is stunning.As I wanted some alone chill-out time I cranked some tunes on the in-house stereo and enjoyed the sun, pools and generally wandering about my private villa. 
The breakfast in the morning was excellent, and I was even driven to grab a fresh coffee in the morning. 
I can not fault the place on any level. I had the best time there - nothing is too much. Next time I am in that neck of the woods I will be booking into O Villas.
title: Sensational

owner_response.text: One night is not long enough - with such a short stay with us, we were so pleased to read your lovely review. We are very happy to hear you had a wonderful time enjoying the villa facilities and that our staff made you feel so welcome. We hope to see you back at O Villas for a longer stay soon.

text: The Villa maintains an extremely high standard of care for the guests. All staff are friendly and helpful. The accommodation is beautifully clean and well looked after. It is wonderful to feel so important and have such good service.

Thankyou for choosing to stay with O Villas again. It is very special for us to welcome back returning guests and for you to have another wonderful holiday. Thankyou for your kind comments on the up-keep of the villas we know we are doing well when our returning visitors make such observations. 

We hope you will stay again with us on your next visit to Bali.

text: recently stayed at o villas for 6 nights during our stay in seminyak. Decided on this villa based on the great reviews, based on our experience it is hard to understand where these came from.we stayed in the one bedroom split level villa with The pool down stairs and the living area upstairs. The villa is dated, the bathrooms are old and very annoying set up with no bath or seperate toilet. The pool is located down stairs which is an inconvenience, and with very little sun exposure. There is no main pool within the complex that you can use instead of. Construction works near by took away from the villa experience. During the day there was consistent drilling going on. The view from this one bedroom villa is not great, an electricity cable and further in the distance is the construction site with a crane. Location is ok, walking to main area of seminyak is fine during the day but at night it is difficult. No pathways and stray dogs. But the villa has a shuttle service and are always willing to drop and pick up. Staff were attentive, almost too attentive and random entries into the villa without notification on two occasions was not appreciated.
title: Expectations not met

owner_response.text:
It is with regret and disappointment we read your experience at the villas. 

We understand the importance and respect of privacy for our guests and you can be assured that we have implemented strict guidelines to our butlers for entering villas. We also now ensure that all guests upon check-in are aware that whenever complete privacy is preferred there is a privacy please plaque on the villa entrance door to be used at their convenience. 

It is unfortunate that there is much construction going on in many areas of Bali and the disruption it can cause to a normally very quiet part of Seminyak. We are constantly monitoring progress of new developments around us and we do try to do whatever we can to minimise disruption to our guests if there is external noise from workers.

The 1-Bedroom villa is a different layout to our more prominent accommodation of 2/3/4 Bedroom villas and it is with regret that the layout and facilities were not to your liking. We do have detailed floor plans and images on our website of our accommodation options to assist in making accommodation choices easier.

We thankyou for your review and opportunity to address your comments.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My friends and I booked O Villa after much research, reading through feebacks & reviews from friends/tripadvisor. We are more than delighted we made the perfect choice. We are traveling in a group of 6 and most villa are 1 or 2 bedroom. The 6 of us stayed at O Villa from 7 Aug to 10 Aug 2014. The price was affordable, we paid less than SGD100/pax/night for a huge yet cozy, clean & well equippied villa (with private pool). We have in fact booked the 3 bedroom villa but was provided the 4 bedroom villa. The staffs were extremely attentive, polite and friendly. 

Let me start from the experience right when we step out from the airport. We were fetch by the drivers (by two separate cars because we had 6 of us and around 6 luggages/baggages). We were first given cold towel each to refresh ourselves & bottles of mineral water were provided during our journey to the villa. O Villa is located at Seminyak, thus it took us approximately 25 minutes. Once we arrive at the villa we were fascinated by how pretty it was. It look fairly modern with a mixture of Bali-style. We were being serve our welcome drinks at the living room. 

Speaking of the space, there is a living room where you could watch dvds (they have quite a number of selection) on projector screen & there is a docking station where you could play the songs from your iphone. Just behind the living room (same space), is where the kitchen & bar is, with a long dining table at the side. Every morning butler will prepare breakfast for us in the kitchen. Breakfast served were rather good especially the porridge and fried rice. The pool is of good size for swimming, each bedroom has a big warobe, safebox & individual toilet. Bedroom 2, 3 and 4 are located at 2nd storey & Bedroom 1 is the only room located at level 1 just beside the pool. Bedroom 1 & 2 both have bathtub in the toilet while Bedroom 3 & 4 have two rainshower each. 

Before our trip we had arranged for a surprise bachelorette party on the day of arrival (first night). We arranged for decoration, bbq and some other food. We were suppose to be out till evening and when we were back, the villa was so beautifully decorated. They even set our dining table just beside the pool and it was awesome. I would be uploading the pictures so you don't have to imagine how it look like :) We were happy with the service provided by O Villa & very thankful for their help with the successful surprise party. 

O Villa is not located right infront of any beach. But it is located less than 10 minutes drive away from Potato head, Kudeta & Metis. The good thing is O Villa provide shutter services in Seminyak. 

The thing that stop me from giving this an excellent rating was due to the shared heater in Room 1 & 2. I guess we probably had used up the heated water & the switch was off. But this happened for two consecutive mornings & we had to resort to going to the unoccupied room at Room 4 to take our bath. Another important thing was that it's wifi connection was rather weak within the villa.

Apart from these 2 points, I would say that O Villa is definitely worth the stay. 6 people in 1 villa is a hella lot of fun!
title: Can't ask for more, I love this place

owner_response.text:
We thankyou for your kind comments and review on O Villas. The villas are well designed for groups of friends and family travelling together with the separate living area to bedrooms it allows guests to create their own private holiday escape. You and your friends sound like you made the most of your holiday and we are so pleased to hear you had so much fun.

Since your stay we have made some significant investment into both the wifi technology with each villa now having it's own router and separate water tanks have now been installed to provide the upper bedrooms their own water source, fixing any water heating or pressure issues.

Thankyou for allowing us to assist with you party celebration, and we hope that it was a holiday your friends will remember and we hope to see you all back in Bali again soon.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Staying in Ovillas was just amazing, since the arrival at the airport till the departure. We are a family of 4 people ( kids of 10 et 12), we stayed 8 nights in Ovillas.
The staff is really amazing : 18 persons just for you. nice and so helpful. We never had a service like that before , better than all the 5 stars we made.

We discover Bali in the best way possible
The Villa is really beautiful, including modern equipments like Home Cinema with Videoprojector, 
we loved to have our luxuous car with driver , our chief for breakfast, 
We took the Barbecue diner: they buy the food and cook it in front of us: Great Experience.
We make also clean

OVillas is located in a quiet place in Seminyak ( the upper area of Bali) , less than 5 mn to the center.
The Swimming pool is very nice and big. The Beach is 5 mn by car and it's very nice and clean.
Internet was slow sometimes, I told to the butler and he fixed it very quickly
I recommend for sure  : Ovillas is a Must do.

text:
I cannot thank the amazing staff of O Villas enough for making my trip such an incredible one! They are there 24/7 with security guards, amazing chefs and excellent butlers and drivers who can take care of anything you need. Whether it be an afternoon snack or needing a driver for the day! The 4 bedroom villas are beautiful, each with the privacy of their own bathrooms, dining room, lounge and massive pool! Each day (after i left my room a bit of a mess!!) i would come home to a perfectly clean bedroom and bathroom! We never stay anywhere else, as we love these villas and our balinese family too much! Would definitely recommend. Would also recommend near by restaurants such as Jemme (especially for sunday roasts), Ultimo (Italian) and Frankensteins Laboratory (awesome themed cabaret show/dinner - just opened up!)
Love always, see you again soon!
title: Absolute Balinese Perfection!

text: The "villa" for 2 persons we had was in reality an apartment on top of the office and kitchen of the administration building. The 1m deep "pool" at the ground floor was very small, surrounded by walls. No pleasure to use it despite the two sun beds which have been there more for optical reasons. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Unfortunately there is a big gap to achieve the perfection and skills we expected. It does not help to wear this typical balinese butler outfit. Breakfast was very average. Obviously also untrained staff in the kitchen. The individual shuttle service was good despite sometimes, depending on the driver, we had to help with my Google maps on my Ipad to find the place we wanted to go. Within Seminyak! Wellknown restaurants and hotels! All offered services like massage and lunch/dinner are done by sub contractors. So we didn't make use of it and went to the original place. Better and much cheaper. Because of booming Bali Ovillas are surrounded of construction work from all directions. Noisy 7 days a week from 8am until 9pm. Wake up call not necessary because there is a very loud siren at 8pm every day to signalize the workers to start. And this construction is a huge hotel which means this takes at least another year to be completed. No fun and on top we could not use the "privacy" of our apartment because the workers were able to view into our private area. We have been several times in Seminyak. So we know lots of alternatives. At least the competition amongst the villa owners is so big that they invest a lot into marketing and shiny web pages. The agencies are doing a perfect job in this regard.  Ovillas is a victim of them. No value for the money you have to spend. Very unprofessional.
title: Perfect marketing via webpage. Unfortunately the reality is a bit disappointing
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Outstanding staff, from the greeting at the airport with bottled water and an ice cold towel, to the morning breakfast, driver service and chef on demand! Villa was just fantastic, and the location was within a short walk and very easy drive from Restaurants and Shopping (although the staff considered me strange for walking when a car is freely available!).
title: Just fantastic

photos.caption: Car and Butler.  Both very cool.

text:
I stayed with my wife and teenage children at O Villas and I cannot recommend the standard, facilities, attention to detail and the wonderful service highly enough.

First time in Bali and first time enjoying the unadulterated luxury of a villa holiday.

Location is excellent, villas are very spacious and excellently designed and furnished, pool was immaculately clean, as was the whole villa.

Staff were amazing, always on hand to pamper our every need without being obtrusive.

Staff were also on hand to assist with restaurant and excursion bookings, and made recommendations for venues that we would never have experienced without their help.

Try Frankenstein's Laboratory in Dhyana Pura Seminyak, a unique themed bar with excellent food and the most amazing cabaret show this side of Las Vegas!

We have cancelled our holiday at Christmas to Thailand and have re booked a vacation in Bali at O Villas as my wife and children are now addicted.

If you want shear luxury, value for money, 6 star service with a smile and the most memorable holiday experience then choose O Villas!
title: Dream vacation of a lifetime!

text:
We have just returned from 9 wonderful nights staying in Villa 2.  I know now what it must be like for the very wealthy, who have people on hand to do everything for them.
When you first arrive there is a tendency to think that you have made a mistake, because, access is down what looks to be somewhat dodgy laneway. This is not that unusual in Semenyak.

The first indication that all is well arrives when you are met by 4 people including your "Butler" you are escorted in to the villa and shown into the beautifully airconditioned lounge dining room/kitchen, where you are served Ice tea and given a very cold towel (very welcome after a long journey), from there you get a tour of the villa, whilst your bags are being brought in and taken to your rooms.
We booked via Wotif, who had a somewhat vague description of the property, it was last minute so we thought we would be stuck with "Self Catering".  A quick call to O Villa in Australia confirmed to me that Breakfast was included in our price (No mention of that on Wotif) every morning our own personal Butler and Chef came to our villa and cooked Eggs any way, bacon, sausage Baked Beans, mushrooms; my daughter wanted pancakes so they made them for her, there is also Nasi Gorng, Mee Goreng Chicken Porridge. Add to that Pastries, Fruit platters and an endless supply of toast.

Part of the trip was to celebrate my Son's 18th Birthday, so we asked for a barbecue, when we arrived back at the Villa from a day out in Nusa Dua, there was a chef cooking Satay sticks,  Fish Kebabs, pork chops, jacket potatoes on a sort of Weber style barbecue and all cooked to perfection, inside we had fried rice, potato salad and various sauces; the room had been decorated with a huge sign on one wall saying Happy Birthday Iain, we also had local decorations suspended from the ceiling. In total we had four people serving and cooking food.

The location could be a problem, except whenever we wanted to go anywhere we merely picked up the phone and a car was brought around for us.  Here is the fun bit, they have two cars, one is a Suzuki People mover and the other is a Volkswagen Kubelwagen. The VW is one very cool car, people stop in the street and wave, every one likes this car even my wife got a buzz out of being picked up at Ultimo restaurant in the middle of Seminyak, very quickly there was a crowd gathered to look at the car.  A word of warning, only use this an a rain free night, there is no aircon and the roof most probably will leak under Balinese type rain!
Kadek, Richard and all the other staff are simply wonderful people who cannot do enough for you.  The villas are spotless and very quiet at night, I have no hesitation in recommending O Villas to anyone.
title: The only place for me!

text:
My sisters and I stayed in the 'apartment' villa which was a 1 bedroom (extra bed was set up in the living room) apartment but more than enough room. The villa was very clean and the staff were incredibly attentive and helpful. Our stay included complimentary breakfasts each day and free shuttles (a personal driver to escort us) around Seminyak to restaurants and sites when we needed a lift. The staff were very flexible when our plans changed and a lot of the time, they helped us book spas, restaurants etc the day before. We also used their in-villa massage service (paid seperately) which was very efficient and affordable and the villa supplied complimentary bug spray and adaptors.

The room service menu was a limited but handy for a quick snack, and their extended dinner menu (based on the price of local ingredients) was a little pricier. The bathroom door is made of glass though and they have a vertical drawstring blind for privacy which got a little annoying to use but some people might not like this.

The villa itself is located a few mins drive from the main street in Seminyak and in a secluded backstreet. A lot of the time when we taxi-ed back to the villa, the drivers didn't recognise the name of the villa so we had to tell them to take us to "Kunja Villa" which was around the corner. Again, a minor complaint.

The management were very attentive also. They offered us complimentary late checkout if noone had booked our apartment on the day we left and Lisa was always on hand to answer any questions I had.

Could not recommend this villa enough! Definitely a boutique stay, if you're looking for something quiet, secluded, with 5 star service and friendly staff!
title: Amazing boutique stay in Seminyak

text:
Stay on march 16-20 in the 4 bedroom villa(Villa 3) but only booked 3 bedroom with one being locked. 

Pros-

Villa was clean,modern with luxury finishing and peaceful.Air con was working well. Good brand for complimentary  coffe(Nescafé) and assorted tea (twinings) provided.Nice to have a nespresso machine and cubes(chargeable but reasonable price).Price for mini bars, room service, lunch, dinner and BBQ menus are reasonable which also taste great. 
The daily in villa cooked breakfast provided was delicious with good varieties. 

Great to have a projector screen together with home theatre system in the living room which is very rare in other villas in bali. Nice to have LCD TVs in the living room and all bedrooms. Also all bedrooms have bathroom attached but only bedroom 1 and 2 have bathtubs with bedroom 1 had an additional outdoor standing shower which is great. There's also extra toilet  and outdoor shower beside the pool which is very convenient. Good to have a sliding doors in the living and dining rooms to keep the sun and mosquito away when needed as mentioned by other reviews. Private pool was nicely design with shallow area for kids,water features and temperature was not too cold even at night. Floaties and pool toys are also provided for the kids.

Shuttle service around seminyak area provided was good as they even can wait if you decide to do a quick shopping like buying groceries,DVDs,etc or if you take longer they can pick you up instead of drop off only service provided by other villas. Reasonable price for the day tour and nice touch to provide complimentary mineral waters and wet towels for the tour.

Butlers Yanti,Richard and kadek was friendly,provide great service and willing to go extra mile.

Cons-

1 of the in room safe was not working and would be repair the next day which I was informed upon arrival but it was not fixed throughout my stay even after reminding them on the 3rd day. Tired of reminding I just share the safe at other rooms. Despite being friendly and the great service, I expect staffs to be more aware.

After spending around SGD $2700 for the stay excluding mini bars,room service and in villa BBQ, day tour,etc, I'm disappointed to be charged 150 000 rupiah (SGD$16) for one broken bottle glass of the complimentary shampoo which my niece dropped. Despite that I didn't argue and paid but this should be waived and 150 000 rupiah (SGD $16) for that is just ridiculous. The wheelchair for my grandma which I requested for the day tour and was quoted 50 000 rupiah per day via the email by Lisa the marketing manager but was charged 75 000 rupiah per day instead. And when I asked about the difference in price, the staff mentioned that price quoted in the email was only for usage in the villa and it cost more to bring it out for the day tour which was not mentioned in the email itself and find it ridiculous. Again I never argue and still paid. Please state the prices clearly in the email. Also Lisa, understand that you are in Australia so can you please pass down the message to the staffs about the arrangement and request made via the email with you clearly as they seem not to be informed about some of the arrangement and request.

It's better to have a gated entrance with the security post beside it similar to some other villas,resorts and hotels around instead of the security post located along the lane to the villas.

Despite the cons, I still will recommend the villas to others and hope to be back due to the villas being clean,luxury finished and peaceful. Also great services by Richard,Yanti and Kadek. Hope the villas will still be well maintained over the years and the cons mentioned will be look into and improve.

Hairudin
Singapore
title: Pleasant stay

photos.caption: Private van for airport transfers and shuttle service.

text:
We have just returned from 2 weeks staying at O villas and we had a great time, very relaxing and easy. O villas have 3 3bedroom villas and one 1bedroom villa. We stayed in the one bed. There were several boxes I wanted ticked before selecting O villas, I wanted a pool, an air conditioned villa that you could close up if you wanted a break from the heat and Mosquitos with a comfortable couch and DVD player. These things are not as easy as you think to find but O villas was the perfect choice in this regard. Initially  I was disappointed to see that the pool was on a different level from the villa ( down a flight of stairs and only the case for the 1 bed ) but in the end it didn't matter too much, I just couldn't yell out to hubby to get me another drink if he was upstairs! 
Each morning the staff asked your plans, if you needed the car to take you anywhere or a restaurant booked. We wanted to see a tailor and they made a good recommendation dropped us there etc. 

A smallish complex, but 17 staff to cater to all your needs, we required vegetarian diet and the chef made us many good meals.

The location wouldn't suit everyone, 10-15 mins walk to ultimo if you know the area but was fine for us, the villa was down a lane and very quite and peaceful. 

Overall great value for money and would recommend.
title: Great value for money
