text: We stayed in Villa 2 for nine nights. We took advantage of a special extra two nights for the price of seven nights. Whilst a little out of the way from the crowds of Seminak, it is still fairly convenient and in a nice quite area. Although in stating this, there is a new complex being built next door so when the serious building activity starts to take place it may not be that quite. We had access to the full four bedrooms and the Villa was very comfortable for our family of six but easily can accommodate more. The rooms, bathrooms and living areas all extra-large in size. Our friends were staying in the Villa (same complex) next door so I would also recommend O Villas for multiple family groups or friends travelling together. Our first couple of days were a bit disappointing. When we arrived the power kept tripping. This progressively got worse until the point where we were without power for 18 hours whilst they found the fault. Dug the yard up and replaced the wiring. Lucky we had access to the Villa next door to use the bathrooms as the water supply was also power dependent. For our inconvenience we were offered a tour for the day (we did not take up as we had other plans) and also a free dinner which we accepted. Outside of this issue, our stay was excellent. The food options onsite are great. Breakfast is included and excellent. We ordered room service on a number of occasions and a BBQ (big selection) twice, just need to order a few hours in advance. One day we went deep sea fishing and arrived back with a big haul of Tuna. The chef cleaned, cooked (four different ways) and served our catch as part of the BBQ. There was plenty left over for the staff. Service from butlers, room attendants and drivers is all well above average. In fact the staff make the biggest difference. We have stayed at numerous, hotels and private Villa’s in Bali. O Villas offers overall, great value for money for upscale accommodation. If I was to get picky outside of the power issue. The bathroom soap dispensers need replacing, the pumps just do not work well. Our pond also had a water pump that was not functioning but if that is all I can find as faults, O Villas comes highly recommended.
title: Great Service

owner_response.text:
Hi Stephen,

It is deeply regrettable the power issues you experienced whilst staying in the villas. The monsoonal weather conditions that Bali experience are unfortunately renowned to effect many 5* hotels and fine world dining restaurants on occasion. Due to the conditions and the power issues we opted to have the power box to the villa moved to location which would result in a long term solution rather than a quick fix. The work to remedy the situation did take longer than we would have liked. We certainly did not foresee such issues and it is with regret that we were fully booked at the time to not be able to move you to another villa at first sign of an issue whilst the work was carried out.

We are pleased to hear that our staff tried to accommodate you in this situation the best they could, please accept our sincere apologies for this inconvenience to you and your family during your holiday.

I was pleased to hear of your successful fishing expedition and that you allowed our chef to prepare and our staff to share in the catch.

We have checked and replaced any faulty bathroom dispensers and the fish pond pump is back to good working order. As part of our process in reviewing guests reviews we have updated our property inspection reports to include such items to ensure the villas are maintained at the high level of standard we expect.

Our local General Manager is in contact with the developers regarding the next door building. All trades and building projects are built by hand in Bali who work to strict day time work schedules. We expect little to no disturbance to our guests. We are however closely monitoring the progress and will ensure if the situation changes we will be in-contact with future guests. 

Thankyou again for the review and we would very much like the chance to have you and your family stay with us again, please contact me via reservations the next time you plan to travel to Bali.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Our week long stay at O Villas was just heavenly. From the moment we walked in we were blown away- the beautifully furnished living area, massive bedrooms, huge en-suites, outdoor shower, tranquil pool and lush gardens were just stunning. 
The villa's layout provided our party of 9 with the opportunity to hang out and play together, or to retreat into our own areas when we needed.
The staff were always friendly and willing to help wherever they could- nothing was too much trouble. My request for cot/highchair and stair gates were ready and waiting upon our arrival.
Meals were fantastic, including a range of free breakfast options- western/indonesian/healthy.
We'll definitely be back.
title: Paradise Found

owner_response.text:
Hi Georgina,

What a fantastic review of our villas, thankyou. We were so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that the villa layout suited your group of friends. Our staff work hard to ensure each of our guests stay is as comfortable as possible, so it was good to hear that your requests made prior to your arrival were there ready and waiting. 

We hope to see you again at O Villas soon.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I agree with the reviewer right before this, the service was amazing but the location is a bit out of the way. If you make sure to have a card on you where the villa actually is though, then it isn't so bad. I definitely agree with the service aspect, they are all so lovely, but they didn't treat our villa as "private" and actually walked in on us one time when we probably didn't want them too, so maybe just some knocking beforehand! The villa and room itself was spectacular, very clean and modern. The breakfast every morning was very fresh and well cooked. We even had a night in where they cooked for us with the BBQ on the balcony, absolute bliss!
title: Great Value Villa

owner_response.text:
Hi Tara,

Thankyou for your review on O Villas.

We are pleased to hear you enjoyed the villas and the chef services for your BBQ, it comes highly recommended.

It is unfortunate to hear about your troubles with location. As there is much development going on in the Seminyak area  and with O Villas still being new, some local taxi drivers are familiarising themselves with our location. We are hoping this improves over time. Thankyou for the great tip to other guests in regards to taking with them one of the business cards when going out. The location map on the back helps the local drivers easily find their way to the villas

We at O Villas respect your privacy and it is with concern to read your comments. We do have policies in place for ringing the doorbell before entering, this is something we will ensure all of our butlers carry out. In respect for your privacy we also have ‘Privacy Please’ plaque on the villa entrance door which will ensure complete privacy at your discretion.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed in Villa number one using all 4 bedrooms. We felt so cared for and well looked after from the moment we were met at the airport until they returned us. 
The villa is absolutely beautiful and even looks better than in the photos. You will very much feel like you are staying at a 5 star hotel.  The bedrooms are large and the bathrooms are enormous! With very modern and lovely furnishings. 
  We had excellent service by the staff and they were always smiling and friendly and we found they were not obtrusive at all.  The food was scrumptious.. do take advantage and have the chef prepare your dinner or lunch.  We have 2 very picky eaters in our family and both were quite pleased by the chef's preparations and meeting of our requests. 
   We felt like the staff made our stay...  you can have a beautiful building anyplace,, but it is rare to encounter such a well trained, friendly, "can do" staff!! 
  We were able to walk to town very easily and we even walked from the beach and walked as far as Legian. 
  We loved having the private pool and the lovely chairs to lay about on. 
It was an excellent stay!
title: Beautiful Villa with Outstanding Staff

owner_response.text:
Hello,

Thankyou for such a fantastic review on O Villas.

We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed so many of the facilities at the villas and especially recognising all of our staff. Our staff do work hard to ensure all of guests have an enjoyable stay with us. 

Thankyou also for your comments about our chef service. We chose to go with catering to the guests requests rather than a fixed menu and we enjoy making sure your dinner, lunch or celebration is catered to you.

Please remember to LIKE us on facebook to hear about promotions.

We look forward to welcoming you back soon.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The service was good and the villas were lovely and clean with great little touches. The location is a bit out of the way and you have to plan everything in advance, so we ran into a couple times when they didn't have the car on hand and we had to walk into town (we encountered a feral dog on one occasion) or we wanted to change our plans last minute but felt hemmed in because we had already told them our entire schedule at the beginning of the trip. Also it depends on what you like, the service is great but the staff are always around, it's a private villa but (for example) if you want to swim/sunbathe topless or do anything private they are always coming in and out unannounced! Though saying that Kadek was a great addition to the villa, he was our private tour driver and was very sweet. The villas are beautiful and a great value for the money spent but I like my privacy and not having to plan so much in advance so I would probably stay elsewhere next time, but that's a personal choice! It's a great place otherwise.
title: Lovely villas, ok location

owner_response.text:
Hi,

Thankyou for your review on O Villas.

We apologies that you felt your holiday was not as spontaneous as you would have liked. As featured on our website our location is an approx. 10 minute walk to the main shopping and dining district of Seminyak. Where possible we offer the complimentary shuttle service in and around the area for our guests. We would like to accommodate each of our guests personal arrangements with the two cars we own. On occasion we however have booked tours and arrival and departure commitments. Our staff will always try and accommodate everyone and can arrange alternate taxi or driver service if required. 

As in most Asian countries local dogs do wonder around quite freely and it is nothing unusual in or around any part of Bali, although Seminyak is not renowned for have particular problems.

It is with further regret to hear about your privacy concerns, our villas are butler attended and they are expected to ring the door bell before entering and to make themselves available to our guests. We have raised this with our staff to ensure this practise is carried out at all times and can only apologise. We would have liked the opportunity to remedy this during your stay to make your stay a more relaxed and comfortable one and we do ask whenever our guests would like complete privacy to make use of the ‘Privacy Please’ plaque located on the villa entrance door.

Thankyou for the comments on Kadek he is a valuable member of team and we receive numerous compliments from his tours. 

Thankyou again for your review and we hope you enjoy your future trips to Bali.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed for 5 days in the 4 bedroom villa with our own private pool.  My daughter loves the pool so much, we can swim and play in the pool at any time of the day.  They even provide floats and balls which was very thoughtful of them.  The staffs was very good.  The butlers were very well trained.  Breakfast was very good, well served.  We had BBQ in the evening, and the food was delicious, it is a must, the fresh seafood and the sos was wonderful.  And best of all after such a wonderful meal, you don't have to even clean your plates, nothing beats the service.  After that you could sit back and enjoy a DVD (they have quite a selection) and a beer or even a glass of wine.  The price for the mini bar are reasonable.  We also enjoyed the massages beside the pool.  They also provide shuttle service/driver to drive us to Kuta, Seminyak area which was very good. This place provide services that are much better then many 5 stars hotel.  So it is totally worth it.
title: Unforgettable stay...

text: We stayed in the one bedroom apartment with our own private pool. The staff couldnt do enough for us and were so friendly and genuine it made the stay so easy and comfortable. Richard served us our prebooked breakfast every morning and the food was fabulous. We had massages on out own balcony every day and had a driver to take us anywhere we needed. It has revived our liking for holidays in Bali which were waning.
title: Best stay in Bali ever

text: My family of 7 stayed in a fantastic 4 bedroom villa in May.  Our villa was perfection with Richard being our private butler and nothing was too much trouble. The bedrooms were enormous, the pool sparkling clean and I loved the outdoor shower off the main bedroom.  The staff were fantastic. Ketut, Richard and the Cook were brilliant.  Walking distance to the town of Seminyak and a short taxi ride to the beach.  Cannot praise this property highly enough.
title: Fantastic

text: My husband and I stayed here for our first leg of our honeymoon Bali trip. This place is very simple, beautiful and clean. Everything is pretty modern which I really enjoyed. We stayed in their "Apartment Villa" (one bedroom) and everything was up to our standards. We loved how we were welcomed when we arrived with a drink and the staff waiting. We were escorted to our villa and showed around. They even had a lovely bag set up with bug spray, sun block, key chain, etc. They truly do pay attention to all the small details here to make you truly feel welcome. More than the place itself we loved and appreciated all the staff. We were greeted every morning with delicious food (a menu you can pick from every day for the following morning) and they also made sure to ask more than once if there was anything else we needed or if they could help with anything. We actually hired one of the staff -Kardek to drive us around Bali for 2 days. They matched the prices with what the tour companies would charge for a full day and we were able to make our own itineraries and enjoy taking our time with each spot we visited. The vehicles were clean, air conditioned, and they even sent us with an ice chest full of cold drinks (again the small details!) On the other nights they do offer a free shuttle to take you into the city of Seminyak. Do remember though to get "business cards" from the staff to help make your return trip easier- since this is a fairly new villa some of the taxi drivers did not know where it was and the cards definitely made it easier. I would honestly say the only downfall of this villa is its location. It is somewhat off the beaten path, a small driveway that leads to it but is not really accessible to walk into the city. If you want somewhere more secluded then this is for sure the spot. I guess because there are so many villas throughout the city its good to look at different locations to see what you would be by.
title: Wonderful!

text:
What can I say except that it's possibly one of the most relaxing places I've been. I spent a lot of time on the Internet and believe we have found a piece of heaven. From the moment we entered, we knew we were in for a treat. It's clean, relaxing, peaceful extremely well appointed, with much attention to detail. Amazing pool, very refreshing and clean. Will definitely return. Staff are friendly and nothing is too much trouble. Keep up the great work O Villa.
Melbourne Australia.
title: O Villas

text:
My wife and I had the wonderful pleasure of staying three weeks at OVilla's.  We stayed two weeks in the one bedroom apartment and one week in one of the 4 bedroom Villa's.  The facilities are amazing, especially the 4 bedroom villa will the beautiful lap pool!!  We especially appreciated that the Alfresco areas of the villa's could be fully closed off with full folding glass doors.  Most of the other villas we researched did not have this feature and thus are continuously exposed to the elements and the Mozi's!

Speaking of Mozi's.  We were pleasantly surprised that we only encountered two or three our entire stay.  My wife is especially sensitive to them and she normally attracts them like a magnet.  No doubt our being able to close the full folding doors in the evening was helpful in making Mozi's a complete non-event!

The staff at Ovilla's are beautiful, kind, helpful and friendly!  We wish we could take them all home with us.  They truly try their best to pamper and satisfy every request, and seem genuine and sincere about their desire to make our holiday unforgettable! 

My wife and I are both dreaming of our next trip to Bali and we definitely desire to stay once again with our lovely friends at this very special oasis in the heart of Seminyak. 

J & V

PS: The restaurants in the area of the Villa are many. varied, and excellent!!
title: Awesome Experience!

text:
We loved our week's holiday at O Villas. The Villa was very modern, clean and well-maintained. The daily freshly prepared breakfast a treat, and the rooms and bathrooms spacious and comfortable. The staff were available and helpful at all times. 
Thankyou to the chef for a specially prepared seafood banquet for a family occasion. It was delicious and much more convenient than going out to celebrate with young children. We would recommend O Villas as a delightfully friendly and relaxed way to wind down and 'chill out'. The pool and day bed were just perfect. 
The location was close to some really interesting bars and restaurants, so the young adults in our group also enjoyed the location. 
Thankyou to the O Villa's staff for your assistance and suggestions - you were all so friendly, polite and helpful!
title: Lovely clean, modern Villa, ideal for a holiday with the extended family, including single young adults, couples, young family w

text: Our stay at O Villas was the perfect way to experience Bali. The staff are very accommodating and their local knowledge is superb. They were always willing to suggest places for us to go and arranged all our transfers efficiently. Meals of our choice were prepared from fresh ingredients in the spacious kitchen/ living area and relaxing by the private pool was the perfect follow-up to this. The bedrooms, all with luxurious private bathrooms, are fit for a king and wonderful to retire to after day trips to the rice terraces and monkey temple, jet-skiing, afternoon shopping in Kuta or a day lazing about in the sun.
title: Perfection

text: The rooms are clean and very well kept as well as modern and supplied with amenities. The service is exceptional, with friendly and accommodating staff members available to help out wherever needed. The staff offered excellent advice on places to visit as well as organising a taxi service there and home which was greatly appreciated. Situated in a quiet location but not too far from the main area of town, it's perfect for a quiet getaway. I would definitely recommend O Villas to friends and family and can't wait to go back and stay there again.
title: Stunning!!!

text:
This was a beautiful stay very secure! The people whom work there become your friends. wasn't a bad thing to point out besides being a bit far from Kuta however after a while is becomes nicer to be away from the hustle and bustle of Bali.
the facilities are beyond beautiful, clean and modern. staff are more then happy to go above and beyond to help you out!
title: Amazing for all

text: Just came back from a week in Bali before going onto Thailand for another week. My stay in O villas was brilliant. The place looked as good or better in real life compared to the photos, the staff were very friendly and so helpful. They made breakfast for us every morning, which costs a very little amount, they drove us into town for free or if we wanted a longer trip to visit a place they charged us a small amount and they came with us for the day. They were also great with recommending places to visit or bars to go to. The rooms were terrfic and cleaned every day. It is a good location as well, as you are far enough away from the main part of town that it is quiet, but you can take a small 15 minute walk into town if you like. It is also a good place if you want to hang around the pool and have a quiet day.
title: Brilliant

text: Stayed 6 nights in O Villas, made for a fantastic stay in Bali! The staff were friendly and welcoming, always willing to go that extra mile for us! The villa itself is second to none, presentation was always immaculate, the photos don't do this place justice! Very easy to have a lazy day in the villa and relax, or the staff will be more than willing to drive you to many of the tourist attractions Bali has to offer for half or full days for very reasonable prices to hire the mini bus. Fridge was always stocked with drinks, which costs next to nothing to have replenished, and the food was excellent. Will definitely return for my next Bali holiday!
title: Will not be disappointed!

text: Stayed here twice now and have had the most amazing time! The staff are the great and the friendliest bunch of people you can meet, always going out of their way to help. The food is top notch and you can't go past it at all, fresh and cooked right there and then. the transport services they provide are exceptionable and handy whenever you want to go anywhere. The rooms are spotless, clean and comfortable, more than anyone could ask for. Overall it was an amazing experience and would definitely recommend it to anyone travelling to Bali!!
title: Excellent!

text:
I have stayed here 3 times now and I can't explain how great these villas are!! From the pick up at the airport to the minute you leave everything is so professional. I was told about these villas from a friend who stayed there and being a former villa owner in Bali I thought that they would be the same as most villas in Bali? From the outside nice but when inside most are a bit old and run down, well these are certainly not, they even have huge projector screens as well as a fantastic range of DVD to watch. 
We stayed in a few times to eat and this was a fantastic experience, the service was 5 star and the food was as good as anything I have eaten at the best restaurants in Bali. If you like breakfast then you will love it here, the young girls who cook for you do the best omelet you could ever taste, just YUMMY,!!
Thanks to Putu ( the villa manager) and all his staff, you are a fantastic group and really do go out there way to make sure you have a great time at O Villas.
Looking forward to seeing you all again, Jimmy (Stuart)
title: Fantastic villa with the best service in Bali

text: Our experience was with 3 other couples all being our first time in Bali. From the arrival at the airport until drop off, O Villas staff and facilities was unbelievable!  The photos on the web do not do this Villa justice, when we arrived we were all amazed at how luxurious and well kept this Villa was.  Not only was the Villa amazing but the Staff were wonderful.  Kadek our driver was informative and friendly, Richard and Ketut our Bultlers were polite, helpful and lovely people.  The meals were beautiful and all the staff went out of there way to make our Bali experience one to remember.  Thank you so much O Villas for our wonderful holiday, we will be back.
title: We will be back

Relaxation is possible here even for someone that struggles. Breakfasts were cooked in house with full table service leaving not a worry in the world. After breakfast the next biggest decision was to relax by the pool or go and explore Seminyak. I loved the staff and really enjoyed Seminyak with its chilled vibe, endless restaurants and extraordinary architecture and landscapes.  Thank you O Villa making my stay one that I shall cherish.

text:
I have just spent a relaxing 9 days in the beautiful O Villas Seminyak. I cannot say enough to describe how welcome the staff made our group of 8 friends and family feel. I celebrated my Birthday there and was given an amazing party in the villa with decorations, traditional Balinese dancers, bbq, mojitos and cake – nothing is too much trouble. The villas are top notch, clean, roomy and private with all your needs more than catered for – the staff are excellent. Breakfast of your choice is cooked and served daily and was yum- we all felt really spoilt!
The villas have a great sound system and even a projector screen if you fancy watching a movie.  The beds are the comfiest I have ever slept in.
Relaxing by the pool is bliss and to top the day off we arranged for a full body Balinese massage whilst laid on the comfy sunbeds by the pool. 
A must - make the most of the food -You can order room service from 10am-10pm I recommend the beef burger or chicken burger, they are spot on. You can also pre-order dinner (3 Hours before) and it is prepared fresh, our group all had something different on the menu – everything was delicious.

text: The service at O Villas is absolutely 5 star! From serving ice cold water at the airport pick up, to the most amazing food and anything else we asked for it was always "no problem". We had a group of 8 people and stayed in the four bedroom villa. The villa has huge rooms all with ensuite, a large lounge/dining room and a private pool. There is so much room we never felt crammed on top of each other. The breakfast is amazing! Cooked and served in the villa, with enough choice to have something different every day. Even cornflakes were served when the children wanted cereal.We ate from the room service menu a few times. The food is excellently prepared and has a good range of western and Indonesian dishes. One night we ordered dinner to be prepared. Meals are prepared in the main kitchen and you pay for ingredients plus 20%. We had fish, steak and pork dishes all of high standard and incredibly cheap compared to restaurants in Seminyak. The pool area was so relaxing it was difficult to go out and experience Seminyak. Free transport to Seminyak was "no problem". If a car is not available the reception staff will call a taxi, costs around A$1-A$2.50 one way to Seminyak.We were even taken to Winehouse to buy some wine (around A$35/bottle). Casa Gourmet in Seminyak Square also sells wine. Ask the staff as there are WA wines with Balinese labels for A$20.We did have dinner at a lovely Japanese restaurant near Seminyak Square (not Ryoshi) but I forget the name. Most restaurants require a booking for dinner but the staff at O Villas can help you with that too! What more can I say? If you stay at O Villas be prepared to relax and be treated like royalty. A special thank you to Ketut and Agung who ensured our every needs were met. We can't wait to come back!
title: 5 star service!

owner_response.text:
Hi Perth Sandgroper!

Well, what can i say ?

What a superb review and so helpful for visitors to the Villas.  We try so hard to promote all the good things about the Villas via our Facebook and website, but when it actually comes directly from our clients, it is the best form of promotion we can ask for.  Everything you have mentioned here is "spot on"" and just confirms how helpful our fantastic team are. Be great to see you again soon, ensure you LIKE our Facebook page to keep up to date with all our new specials.

Regards
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
LOVE IT HERE!!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Recently spent a week at O Villas, staying with 7 others. We were in the 4 bed room villa which was extremely spacious, much larger than what I thought judging by the photos on their website. 

The first thing we were thinking when we arrived was 'is this all for us?' because again, on the website it looks as if the lap pool might be part of the lobby area. The rooms were massive (especially room 1 on the bottom floor), beds quite comfortable and the bathrooms were spacious. The furnishings everywhere were nice and overall it was quite stylish Although I didn't see all of the upstairs bathrooms, I believe two of them were a little smaller. Still enough space for everyone though. Only complaint about the bathrooms was that the water pressure wasn't great and one of the rooms couldn't get warm water intermittently. 

The pool area was where we spent most of our time, the day bed was great..could comfortably fit four people on there, had a fan in case it was too hot, and their were four sun beds to tan/snooze/star gaze on. There is power at in the day bed so you can move the iPod dock from the lounge room outside which was great and the outside bathroom was really useful. Not that it could really be helped but at this time of year the sun didn't really go over the pool that much, so it was a bit cold. It would have been great if the pool was heated, but might be overkill for the other times of the year. It would also be nice if the outside towels were cleaned more regularly, as they appeared dirty and we couldn't tell if they were washed for the duration of our stay.

Breakfast daily was superb, you had two menus which were basically Western (eggs, bacon, sausages etc) or Asian (Mie Goreng, Nasi Goreng etc) everything was delicious and you could probably order whatever you wanted and the staff would make it for you. 'No Problem.' We ate dinner in the Villa twice which is extremely affordable (pay for ingredients +20%, worked out to be about 400,000 IDR for 8 people per dinner) everything was delicious, only complaint was a couple of the meals weren't quite hot as they tended to bring them out together. I imagine this is because of the small kitchen, just ask them to bring them out as they're ready.

The staff overall gave us incredible service, nothing was too hard for them, although we probably didn't utilize them us much as we could have. Special mention to Ketut & Kadeh who helped us a lot and were extremely friendly even when we had 'big party' and made quite a mess. The staff drove us anywhere in Seminyak free of charge as well as giving us complimentary transfers to the airport which was much appreciated.

Overall I wouldn't hesitate recommending O Villas to groups, I didn't get to see the 1 bedrooms but can imagine they are of an equal standard and can't wait to go back!

title: Personnel parfait 👍

text:
Estuvimos nueve días a finales de agosto y nuestra opinión es claramente positiva. Lo que destacaría especialmente es la amabilidad y plena disposición del staff, que nos atendió en todo momento con exquisita amabilidad.
La villa para dos es amplia y muy agradable, aunque se encuentra un poco aislada (lo cual también puede ser una ventaja). No obstante el servicio gratuito de desplazamiento por la zona de Seminyak nos facilitó mucho las cosas.
A pesar de pequeños detalles en cuanto al estado de las sábanas, todo estaba en buenas condiciones. Mención especial merece el desayuno desde la terraza servido con exquisita puntualidad por el personal.
Sin que se les hubiera informado de ello, organizaron una fiesta sorpresa a mi mujer por su cumpleaños, decorando la habitación y subiéndonos una tarta a la villa para que soplara las velas.
Muchas gracias a todos por haber hecho de estas vacaciones las mejores de nuestras vidas. Siempre os llevaremos en el corazón.
Lo único negativo es tener que volver a la triste realidad de mi ciudad 😔.
title: Amabilidad extrema

text:
12人で4 bed roomのVilla2棟に滞在しました。ヴィラは奥まったところにあり、プライベート感満載、門をくぐると豪華なヴィラと綺麗なプール！リビングには花が飾られ、フルーツが用意してあり、とても美味しいWelcomeドリンクを頂き、温かい歓迎にテンションが上がりました。
迎えてくれたトミーさんというバトラーが、滞在中ずっと細やかにケアしてくれました。私たちは大所帯だったので12人乗りのVan（ドライバーさん付）を1日10000円で依頼しましたが、通常のVanであればスミニャク内は無料で送迎してくれるとのことでした。
毎朝3人くらいのスタッフが台所で調理をしてサーブしてくれ、外出から帰った時などにはトミーさんがコーヒーを入れてくれたりフルーツを切ってくれたりと、とても贅沢な感じでした。有料で外でBBQもできるということで、最終日の夜にBBQをお願いしました。ここでも数人のスタッフが焼いてテーブルまで運んで下さるので我々は座ったまま。朝食もBBQも、食事がとても美味しく、大満足でした。
ロンボンガン島への現地ツアーの予約もトミーさんに依頼し、シュノーケルだけで良いので安く行きたい旨をお伝えしたところ、ツアー会社と交渉してリーズナブルなツアーを手配して下さいました。
空港での送迎、施設、食事、サービスなど全て問題なく、ホスピタリティーも素晴らしかったです。
title: 快適な滞在でした

text:
ホテル予約サイトから予約しました。
マッブの位置は違っているので自力で行く方はストリートビューで確認してください。タクシーに言っても分かりません。ヴィラ クンジャ方面からヴィラ アイルバリに向かって行くとヴィラ アイルのカーブ手前を石の看板を目印に左折します。
ホテルは空港送迎も付いています。
また、宿泊中は近隣は夜11時まで無料送迎してくれます。
ディナーのレストランへの送り迎えに利用させて貰いました。
部屋は二人なので1ベッドルームに泊まりました。1階はプライベートプール、2階が部屋＆広いキッチン付きテラスになります。愛煙家の私達はテラスがとても心地良かったです。
シャワーの水圧も十分で、部屋も広くとてもシックで綺麗です。
スタッフさんは男性ばかりでしたが、皆さん真面目そうな感じで不安感は一切ありません。
会話はお互いに片言の英語でなんとかなりました。
また泊まりに行こうと思います。
title: とてもフレンドリー

text:
Les chambres/villas sont très spacieuses, la piscine est parfaite. Le gros PLUS de O Villas c'est le personnel. Ils sont réellement à votre service pour que tout se passe au  mieux. Les chauffeurs sont à votre disposition pour aller au centre de Seminyak quand vous le souhaitez ou même faire des excursions (en supplément). 

Les moins : 
- Les finitions sont à "l'indonésienne" c'est à dire que tout y est mais ça pourrait encore être mieux (peinture, prise qui ne tient plus, ampoules grillées, ...) 
- La localisation n'est pas au centre mais vu qu'il y a des navettes, ce n'est pas un problème. -
- Les chauffeurs pourraient avoir un meilleur niveau d'anglais

En conclusion : Presque parfait malgré quelque détails à améliorer.
title: Très bien mais peut encore mieux

text:
